4fb6e446acc8.market_context: All market regimes with regime-specific calibration
entry_conditions: Traditional turtle soup setup (false breakout of recent high/low)
Momentum divergence: price makes new extreme but momentum oscillator shows weakness
exit_conditions: Stop: 1.5x average true range from entry in bear markets, 1.0x in bull markets
Target: 2:1 risk-reward ratio adjusted for regime volatility
Time-based: Exit after 3 days if no meaningful progress toward target
4fb6e446acc8.risk_management: Position size inversely correlated with regime volatility; maximum 1% risk per trade in bear markets, 1.5% in bull markets
4fb6e446acc8.rationale: Bear markets require different risk parameters and confirmation signals due to momentum persistence and higher volatility, while maintaining the core mean reversion thesis with regime-appropriate calibration.

57d4a1663495.name: Bear_Momentum_Fade
57d4a1663495.concept: Fade weak bounces in bear markets by identifying failed turtle soup setups and riding the continuation move.
57d4a1663495.market_context: Bear market regimes with high volatility
entry_conditions: Turtle soup reversal signal triggers but fails within 2 bars
Volume on failure bar exceeds 1.5x average
Price breaks below turtle soup entry level
exit_conditions: Stop: Price recovers above turtle soup high
Target: 2x the initial turtle soup range
57d4a1663495.risk_management: Position size 0.5x normal due to regime uncertainty; maximum 3 concurrent positions
57d4a1663495.rationale: Failed reversals in bear markets often lead to strong continuation moves as trapped bulls capitulate, creating predictable momentum opportunities.

502a93771a6c.name: Bear_Soup_Filter
502a93771a6c.concept: Filter turtle soup trades in bear markets using momentum and volume confirmation
502a93771a6c.market_context: Bear market regimes with high volatility
entry_conditions: regime = BEAR AND turtle_soup pattern identified
Price breaks below previous support with conviction
exit_conditions: Stop: 1.5% above entry (tight stop in bear market)
Target: Next significant support level or 3% profit
502a93771a6c.risk_management: Position size 50% of normal allocation due to bear market uncertainty
502a93771a6c.rationale: Bear markets require confirmation of failed breakouts through volume and momentum rather than purely technical pattern recognition

e668cfc1b1d2.name: Bear_Momentum_Filter
e668cfc1b1d2.concept: Filter turtle soup setups by requiring momentum divergence confirmation before entry
e668cfc1b1d2.market_context: Bear market regimes with high directional momentum
entry_conditions: RSI divergence between price low and indicator
Volume expansion on reversal bar exceeds 1.5x 20-day average
exit_conditions: Stop: 1.5x average true range below entry
Time exit: Close position if no progress within 3 days
e668cfc1b1d2.risk_management: Position size = 1% account risk per trade, maximum 3 concurrent positions
e668cfc1b1d2.rationale: Momentum divergence may identify genuine exhaustion points where turtle soup reversals can succeed even in bear markets

76a15b31c1bb.name: Confidence_Decay_Filter
76a15b31c1bb.concept: Dynamically reduce position size as confidence increases beyond historical accuracy thresholds
76a15b31c1bb.market_context: All market regimes, particularly during pattern recognition trades
entry_conditions: Apply confidence penalty multiplier: position_size = base_size * (1 - max(0, confidence - calibrated_threshold))
Require at least 2 confirming indicators when confidence > 65%
exit_conditions: Profit target at 1.5R (reduced from typical 2R due to sizing adjustment)
Exit if confidence recalibration drops below 40%
76a15b31c1bb.risk_management: Maximum 0.5% account risk per trade when confidence > 70%, standard 1% below that threshold
76a15b31c1bb.rationale: Paradoxical position sizing that reduces exposure when the model is most certain, protecting against overconfidence bias and model overfitting

53f87366701b.name: Bear_Momentum_Continuation
53f87366701b.concept: Trade with the bear market trend when turtle soup patterns fail, converting losses into gains
53f87366701b.market_context: bear market regimes with failed reversal patterns
entry_conditions: regime = BEAR AND turtle_soup pattern triggers but fails within 2 bars
Volume > 1.5x average on the failure bar
RSI still below 40 after failed reversal attempt
53f87366701b.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% account risk per trade, maximum 3 concurrent positions
53f87366701b.rationale: Failed reversals in bear markets often signal strong underlying selling pressure; riding the continuation can recover turtle soup losses while maintaining disciplined risk management

58c488cedff2.name: Adaptive_Context_Sizing
58c488cedff2.concept: Dynamically adjust position sizes based on recent performance in specific market contexts rather than avoiding them entirely.
58c488cedff2.market_context: Any recurring losing pattern in specific regime/strategy combinations
entry_conditions: Context-specific recent performance below threshold (e.g., <40% win rate in last 10 trades)
exit_conditions: Reduced position size limits maximum loss per trade
Context performance improvement triggers size normalization
58c488cedff2.risk_management: Position size = base_size * min(1.0, max(0.25, context_win_rate / target_win_rate))
58c488cedff2.rationale: Preserves exposure to potentially valuable signals while protecting capital during adverse periods, allowing for strategy recovery without complete abandonment.

dcce74b2f2db.name: Bear_Soup_Timing_Filter
dcce74b2f2db.concept: Apply turtle soup strategy in bear markets only during low-volume, post-lunch periods when retail sentiment dominates over institutional flows.
dcce74b2f2db.market_context: Bear market regimes with clear trend direction
entry_conditions: turtle soup setup present (false breakout above resistance)
exit_conditions: Stop: 1.5x average true range above entry
Time: Close position at 15:45 regardless of P&L
dcce74b2f2db.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% account risk, maximum 2 concurrent positions
dcce74b2f2db.rationale: Bear market turtle soup may work better when institutional pressure is reduced, allowing retail-driven false breakouts to revert more predictably to technical support levels.

1107e3771831.name: Bear_Regime_Turtle_Filter
1107e3771831.concept: Apply strict volume and momentum filters to turtle soup setups during bear market regimes
1107e3771831.market_context: Bear market regimes with high volatility and negative sentiment
entry_conditions: volume_ratio > 1.5 (above average volume on the reversal)
rsi > 35 (not oversold, indicating some underlying strength)
exit_conditions: Target: 2% above entry (tight risk/reward in bear context)
Time exit: Close position if no movement within 3 days
1107e3771831.risk_management: Reduce position size by 50% in bear regime turtle soup setups; maximum 2% portfolio risk per trade
1107e3771831.rationale: Bear markets require higher conviction signals for turtle soup patterns; volume and momentum filters help identify the rare occasions when buying pressure is genuine enough to sustain a reversal

f0be0b233cd6.name: Concern_Weight_Validator
f0be0b233cd6.concept: Dynamically adjust position size based on the number and severity of identified concerns before trade execution.
f0be0b233cd6.market_context: All market regimes, particularly effective in choppy or transitional periods
entry_conditions: Concern score calculated (weighted sum of identified risks)
exit_conditions: Original strategy stop loss (adjusted for reduced position)
Concern escalation trigger (new concerns emerge post-entry)
Time decay exit if concerns persist beyond expected holding period
f0be0b233cd6.risk_management: Maximum 50% position reduction based on concerns; minimum 0.25R position to maintain signal validity
f0be0b233cd6.rationale: This addresses the core issue of proceeding despite valid concerns by creating a systematic framework to incorporate doubt into position sizing, potentially improving risk-adjusted returns while maintaining strategy integrity.

065a48ad91dc.name: Bear_Soup_Layering
065a48ad91dc.concept: Scale into turtle soup reversals with multiple smaller entries rather than single large positions during bear markets
065a48ad91dc.market_context: bear market regimes with elevated volatility
entry_conditions: Initial 25% position on first reversal signal
Add 25% on each subsequent 1% adverse move (max 4 layers)
exit_conditions: Stop loss at 4% from average entry price
Take profit at 2% above average entry
065a48ad91dc.risk_management: Maximum 2% portfolio risk per trade, position sizing inversely correlated to recent volatility
065a48ad91dc.rationale: Bear markets create choppier price action where single-entry turtle soup fails, but layered entries can capture the eventual mean reversion while managing the extended momentum risk

3d52ee081ac3.name: Bear_Regime_Filter
3d52ee081ac3.concept: Apply turtle soup patterns only when bear market conditions show signs of exhaustion rather than acceleration.
3d52ee081ac3.market_context: Bear market regimes with potential for short-term bounces
entry_conditions: Traditional turtle soup setup present (false breakdown below support)
VIX > 25 but declining over past 3 days
Market down > 15% from recent highs but showing positive divergence in momentum indicators
exit_conditions: Stop loss at 1.5x the false breakdown distance
Take profit at 61.8% retracement of the breakdown move
Exit if VIX spikes > 20% intraday (panic selling resumption)
3d52ee081ac3.risk_management: Position size limited to 0.5% risk per trade; maximum 2 concurrent bear regime turtle soup trades
3d52ee081ac3.rationale: This strategy acknowledges that turtle soup can work in bear markets, but only when selling pressure is waning rather than accelerating, using volatility and volume as regime health indicators.

1959e92683de.name: Regime_Adaptive_Turtle
1959e92683de.concept: Dynamically invert turtle soup signals based on market regime strength and momentum persistence
1959e92683de.market_context: Bear markets with high momentum persistence (trend_strength > 0.7)
entry_conditions: Traditional turtle soup setup occurs (false breakout)
Enter in direction of prevailing trend (short) rather than counter-trend
exit_conditions: Stop: 1.5x average true range above entry
Time: Exit after 5 days regardless of P&L
1959e92683de.risk_management: Reduce position size by 50% in bear regimes; maximum 2% portfolio risk per trade
1959e92683de.rationale: In strong bear markets, traditional reversal patterns may signal continuation rather than exhaustion, requiring strategy inversion rather than avoidance

596d4aac5a84.name: Bear_Turtle_Confirmation
596d4aac5a84.concept: Only trade turtle soup reversals in bear markets when multiple confirmation signals align to reduce false breakout risk.
596d4aac5a84.market_context: Bear market regimes with apparent support/resistance breakouts
entry_conditions: Turtle soup setup identified (false breakout below support)
Volume on breakout day < 20-day average (weak conviction)
Price closes in top 25% of daily range (intraday reversal)
exit_conditions: Stop: 1.5x average true range below entry
596d4aac5a84.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% account risk per trade (half normal size due to bear market environment)
596d4aac5a84.rationale: Bear markets make simple turtle soup reversals unreliable, but adding confluence factors (oversold momentum, weak volume, intraday strength) could filter for higher-probability setups while acknowledging the challenging environment with reduced position sizing.

6bfc1194f546.name: Confidence_Concern_Divergence
6bfc1194f546.concept: Exploit the gap between stated concerns and confidence levels to identify high-risk trades
6bfc1194f546.market_context: All market regimes when bot shows cognitive dissonance
exit_conditions: Tighter stop loss (0.5R instead of standard)
6bfc1194f546.risk_management: Halve normal position size when divergence detected
6bfc1194f546.rationale: The bot's own internal conflict signals may be more predictive than its final confidence score, creating an edge through meta-analysis of decision quality.

e1547a39cf07.name: Bear_Soup_Fade
e1547a39cf07.concept: Systematically fade turtle soup setups in confirmed bear regimes by shorting the failed reversal.
e1547a39cf07.market_context: Bear market regimes with elevated volatility and downtrend confirmation
entry_conditions: Turtle soup pattern identified (failed breakout above prior day high)
Bear regime confirmed (20/50 MA slope negative, SPY below 200 MA)
Entry on break below turtle soup low with volume confirmation
exit_conditions: Target: Previous significant support level or 3:1 R/R
Time exit: Close position after 3 trading days regardless
e1547a39cf07.risk_management: Position size = 1% account risk per trade, maximum 3 concurrent positions
e1547a39cf07.rationale: Failed bullish reversals in bear markets often signal exhausted buying pressure and continuation of the primary trend, especially when retail traders are trapped in false breakouts.

0932e835c276.name: Adaptive_Context_Sizing
0932e835c276.concept: Dynamically adjust position sizes based on historical context-specific performance rather than binary on/off decisions.
0932e835c276.market_context: All market regimes, particularly during identified underperforming contexts
entry_conditions: Original signal criteria met (e.g., turtle_soup setup)
exit_conditions: Dynamic stop based on context volatility (1.5x normal ATR for weak contexts)
Time decay exit if context shows persistent underperformance
0932e835c276.risk_management: Position size = base_size × context_multiplier (0.25x to 1.5x based on rolling 50-trade context performance)
0932e835c276.rationale: Preserves exposure to potentially profitable setups while mathematically adjusting for context-specific risk, avoiding the information loss from complete avoidance.

d7e6909f5d72.name: Adaptive_Turtle_Soup_Filter
d7e6909f5d72.concept: Filter turtle soup trades based on market microstructure and recent pattern reliability
d7e6909f5d72.market_context: Bear markets with high turtle soup failure rates
exit_conditions: Target: 2x ATR or volume exhaustion signal
Time: End of session if no clear resolution
d7e6909f5d72.rationale: By incorporating recent pattern reliability and microstructure quality, this strategy adapts to changing market conditions rather than blindly following historical patterns, potentially reducing the clustering of losses seen in bear market turtle soup scenarios.

f0a0343b18a2.name: Momentum_Regime_Filter
f0a0343b18a2.concept: Dynamically disable contrarian strategies when momentum persistence indicators exceed threshold
f0a0343b18a2.market_context: Bear markets with sustained directional pressure and low volatility
entry_conditions: 5-day momentum persistence score < 0.3 (indicating choppy rather than trending conditions)
exit_conditions: Emergency exit if momentum persistence score rises above 0.6 mid-trade
f0a0343b18a2.risk_management: Reduce position size by 50% when momentum persistence score between 0.3-0.5; no entry above 0.5
f0a0343b18a2.rationale: Filters out turtle soup trades during momentum regimes where contrarian plays historically fail, preserving capital for higher-probability setups.

76f8ccfbb83c.name: Confidence_Conflict_Filter
76f8ccfbb83c.concept: Reduce position size or abstain from trades when high confidence coincides with noted concerns or conflicting signals.
76f8ccfbb83c.market_context: All market regimes, particularly choppy or transitional periods
entry_conditions: Confidence level adjusted down by 20% if any concerns are flagged
No entry if adjusted confidence < 60% AND concern_severity > 0.5
exit_conditions: Standard stop loss reduced by 25% when original confidence was >70%
Profit target reduced by 15% in choppy regimes
Force exit if new conflicting signals emerge post-entry
76f8ccfbb83c.rationale: Creates a systematic brake on overconfidence while preserving the ability to act on genuinely high-probability setups, addressing the core confidence-reality mismatch.

ab311c1296dd.name: Bear_Regime_Liquidity_Filter
ab311c1296dd.concept: Avoid counter-trend setups during bear markets when volume and volatility conditions indicate low mean reversion probability
ab311c1296dd.market_context: Bear market regimes with deteriorating liquidity conditions
entry_conditions: Skip turtle_soup and similar counter-trend signals when regime = BEAR
exit_conditions: Standard turtle_soup exit rules when trade is taken
Regime change to neutral/bull (strategy suspension lift)
ab311c1296dd.risk_management: Reduce position size by 50% for any counter-trend trades in bear regimes
ab311c1296dd.rationale: Bear markets fundamentally alter market microstructure, reducing the effectiveness of breakout failure patterns due to persistent selling pressure and reduced participant diversity

fea5486c9d98.name: Bear_Soup_Fade
fea5486c9d98.concept: Systematically fade turtle soup breakouts in confirmed bear markets with volatility confirmation
fea5486c9d98.market_context: Bear market regimes with elevated volatility
entry_conditions: Confirmed bear market (20-day MA below 50-day MA for >10 days)
Turtle soup pattern identified (false breakout above/below key level)
Entry on reversal back through the false breakout level
Volume confirmation (breakout volume >1.5x average, reversal volume >1.2x average)
exit_conditions: Stop loss: 1.5x the false breakout range
Target: 2x the false breakout range in opposite direction
Time exit: Close position if no movement toward target within 3 days
fea5486c9d98.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% account risk per trade, maximum 3 concurrent positions
fea5486c9d98.rationale: Bear markets create systematic liquidity issues that make false breakouts more predictable, while retail sentiment often drives these failed patterns as stop-hunting becomes more prevalent

09d88ae800dc.name: Bear_Soup_Filter
09d88ae800dc.concept: Layer additional confirmation filters on turtle soup setups during bear markets rather than avoiding them entirely.
09d88ae800dc.market_context: Bear market regimes with turtle soup reversal signals
exit_conditions: Stop: 1.5x average daily range below entry
Time: Exit after 3 days if no movement
09d88ae800dc.risk_management: Position size = 0.5x normal during bear markets, maximum 2% portfolio risk per trade
09d88ae800dc.rationale: Rather than abandoning turtle soup in bear markets, this strategy adds institutional flow and momentum filters to improve edge while maintaining the core reversal logic.

d2c6e3beb9e8.name: Bear_Momentum_Turtle
d2c6e3beb9e8.concept: Flip turtle soup logic in bear markets to trade with failed reversals instead of against them
d2c6e3beb9e8.market_context: Bear regimes with high volatility and strong downtrend momentum
entry_conditions: Regime = BEAR AND turtle soup setup triggers
Price fails to hold above breakdown level within 2 bars
exit_conditions: Stop: Price closes above turtle soup trigger level
Target: 2x the initial turtle soup range
Time: Close position after 5 trading days maximum
d2c6e3beb9e8.risk_management: Position size = 0.5x normal turtle soup allocation, maximum 2% account risk per trade
d2c6e3beb9e8.rationale: Rather than avoiding bear/turtle_soup contexts, exploit the tendency for failed reversals to continue as momentum trades, essentially using turtle soup failure as a momentum entry signal

cca8847d5b8a.name: Concern_Weight_Filter
cca8847d5b8a.concept: Dynamically adjust position sizing based on the number and severity of noted concerns before trade execution.
cca8847d5b8a.market_context: All market conditions, particularly when multiple conflicting signals are present
exit_conditions: Partial profit-taking at 0.5R when concerns were noted
Full exit if new concerns emerge post-entry
cca8847d5b8a.risk_management: Maximum 0.5R risk when concern_score > 0.3, standard 1R otherwise
cca8847d5b8a.rationale: The bot's internal warning system appears functional but underweighted - this strategy monetizes that signal by treating concerns as valuable risk information rather than noise to overcome.

81d68b6fc22a.name: Bear_Context_Filter
81d68b6fc22a.concept: Dynamically adjust turtle soup position sizing based on bear market sub-regime classification
81d68b6fc22a.market_context: Bear markets with varying volatility and credit conditions
entry_conditions: Classify bear sub-regime (grinding vs. panic vs. recovery)
Scale position size: 25% during panic, 50% during grinding, 75% during recovery
exit_conditions: Standard turtle soup stops but tightened by 25% during panic regimes
Profit targets reduced by 30% in grinding bears
Time-based exit: 3 days max hold during panic regimes
81d68b6fc22a.risk_management: Maximum 1% risk per trade, reduced to 0.5% during panic sub-regimes
81d68b6fc22a.rationale: Bear markets aren't homogeneous - different sub-regimes require different risk appetites for the same technical patterns

987ca05ab7ff.name: Bear_Momentum_Confirmation
987ca05ab7ff.concept: Instead of fading false breakouts in bear markets, ride the momentum after initial turtle soup failure
987ca05ab7ff.market_context: Bear markets with elevated volatility where traditional mean reversion fails
entry_conditions: Initial turtle soup reversal signal triggers
Position closes below/above turtle soup entry within 2 days
exit_conditions: Return to turtle soup trigger level (stop loss)
987ca05ab7ff.risk_management: Half normal position size due to increased volatility; maximum 2% portfolio risk per trade
987ca05ab7ff.rationale: When turtle soup fails in bear markets, it often signals the start of genuine momentum moves driven by forced selling or panic, creating profitable trend-following opportunities.

84e0a1be04f8.name: Adaptive_Turtle_Soup
84e0a1be04f8.concept: Dynamic position sizing and directional bias for turtle soup patterns based on regime volatility and momentum persistence
entry_conditions: Failed breakout confirmed (price returns inside range within 2 bars)
RSI divergence present on the breakout attempt
exit_conditions: Stop: 1.5x ATR from entry (tighter than normal due to regime)
Target: Return to opposite range boundary or 2x ATR profit
Time: Exit at close if position held > 3 days without progress
84e0a1be04f8.risk_management: Position size = base_size * (1 - normalized_VIX/100) to reduce exposure during high volatility
84e0a1be04f8.rationale: Bear markets create asymmetric risk where failed patterns often continue failing; smaller positions with regime-aware exits can capture this while limiting drawdown exposure

5e80c2a2b30b.name: Bear_Soup_Fade
5e80c2a2b30b.concept: Systematically fade failed breakout attempts in bear market regimes when volume confirms weakness
5e80c2a2b30b.market_context: Bear market regimes with elevated volatility and declining volume trends
exit_conditions: Stop: price closes above breakout level + 1.5x ATR
Target: return to pre-breakout support level
Time: close position after 3 trading sessions if no movement
5e80c2a2b30b.risk_management: Position size = 0.5x normal due to bear market volatility; max 3 concurrent positions
5e80c2a2b30b.rationale: Bear markets create systematic failure of momentum strategies as institutional selling pressure overwhelms retail buying, making failed breakouts highly predictable reversal points.

bdff0003f323.name: Concern_Weight_Adaptive
bdff0003f323.concept: Dynamically adjust position sizing and confidence thresholds based on the number and severity of flagged concerns.
bdff0003f323.market_context: All market conditions, particularly when multiple warning signals are present
entry_conditions: Concern score calculated from flagged issues
Position size inversely proportional to concern score
exit_conditions: Tighter stops when concern score > threshold
Profit targets reduced proportionally to concern level
Mandatory slow-path review if concerns exceed critical level
bdff0003f323.risk_management: Maximum 0.3R risk when concern score is high, standard sizing only when concern score is minimal
bdff0003f323.rationale: This addresses the bot's tendency to ignore its own warning systems by making risk management proportional to internal doubt signals.

75d72c577870.name: Regime_Adaptive_Turtle
75d72c577870.concept: Dynamically adjust turtle soup parameters based on market regime and volatility characteristics
75d72c577870.market_context: All market regimes with regime-specific parameter sets
entry_conditions: Standard turtle soup setup (false breakout below support)
Regime-adjusted volatility filter (BEAR: ATR > 2% | BULL: ATR > 1.2%)
Volume confirmation (1.5x average on false breakout day)
exit_conditions: Stop: 1.5x ATR below entry (bear) or 1x ATR below entry (bull)
Target: 2x risk in bear markets, 3x risk in bull markets
75d72c577870.risk_management: Position size inversely correlated with regime volatility (smaller in bear, larger in bull)
75d72c577870.rationale: Current turtle soup logic may be regime-agnostic; adapting parameters to market character could improve performance while maintaining the core reversal concept

50a6c6d3fdb8.name: Bear_Momentum_Filter
50a6c6d3fdb8.concept: Dynamically switch between counter-trend and trend-following based on bear market momentum strength
50a6c6d3fdb8.market_context: bear market regimes with varying momentum characteristics
entry_conditions: If momentum_score < threshold: execute turtle_soup counter-trend
If momentum_score > threshold: execute trend-following breakout
50a6c6d3fdb8.risk_management: Position size inversely correlated with momentum_score; maximum 2% risk per trade
50a6c6d3fdb8.rationale: Rather than avoiding turtle soup in bear markets entirely, this strategy recognizes that bear markets have different momentum regimes requiring adaptive strategy selection

02682648f9e0.name: Regime_Adaptive_Turtle
02682648f9e0.concept: Dynamically adjust turtle soup entry criteria based on market regime and volume characteristics
02682648f9e0.market_context: Bear markets with low volume conviction at support levels
entry_conditions: Regime = BEAR requires volume_ratio > 1.5 for entry
Regime = BULL allows standard volume criteria
exit_conditions: Stop loss tightened by 25% in bear markets
Profit target reduced by 15% in bear regimes
Maximum hold time reduced from 5 days to 3 days in bear markets
02682648f9e0.risk_management: Position size reduced by 40% during bear market turtle soup setups
02682648f9e0.rationale: Bear markets require higher conviction signals due to weaker mean reversion tendencies and stronger continuation bias

363baa6e3424.name: Regime_Adaptive_Turtle_Soup
363baa6e3424.concept: Dynamically adjust turtle soup entry criteria based on market regime and recent pattern reliability
363baa6e3424.market_context: All market regimes with enhanced filtering during bear markets
entry_conditions: Classic turtle soup setup (false breakout reversal)
Regime filter: In BEAR markets, require additional confirmation (RSI oversold + positive divergence)
exit_conditions: Stop loss: 1.5x average true range below entry (bear markets) / 1.0x ATR (bull markets)
Time exit: Close position if no progress toward target within 3 trading days
363baa6e3424.risk_management: Position size = base_size * (1 - recent_failure_rate) * regime_multiplier (0.5 for BEAR, 1.0 for BULL)
363baa6e3424.rationale: Addresses the specific bear market turtle soup failures by requiring stronger confirmation signals and reducing position sizes during unfavorable regimes while maintaining strategy exposure

e942833a0bd6.name: Concern_Flag_Circuit_Breaker
e942833a0bd6.concept: Automatically route decisions to slow-path analysis when internal concern flags exceed threshold
e942833a0bd6.market_context: all market conditions, especially when pattern confidence conflicts with risk signals
entry_conditions: Confidence adjusted down by 20% per active concern flag
exit_conditions: Time decay: exit after 50% of expected hold time if no progress
e942833a0bd6.risk_management: Position size reduced by 25% for each active concern flag at entry
e942833a0bd6.rationale: Creates systematic check against overconfident decisions by forcing deliberative analysis when risk signals conflict with pattern recognition

50ba41018987.name: Regime_Adaptive_Turtle
50ba41018987.concept: Dynamically adjust turtle soup entry criteria based on market regime strength and volatility clustering
50ba41018987.market_context: Bear markets with high volatility and strong downtrends
entry_conditions: RSI divergence confirmed on multiple timeframes
exit_conditions: Stop: 1.5x normal turtle soup stop in bear regimes
Target: 0.75x normal profit target to account for weaker reversals
Time: Exit after 3 days if no momentum
50ba41018987.risk_management: Reduce position size by 50% in confirmed bear regimes; maximum 2% portfolio risk per trade
50ba41018987.rationale: Bear markets may require tighter risk controls and modified expectations for reversal strategies, but complete avoidance ignores potential opportunities

c4f4f5990e24.name: Bear_Regime_Turtle_Filter
c4f4f5990e24.concept: Apply turtle soup strategy only after bear market regimes have stabilized beyond initial transition period
c4f4f5990e24.market_context: Bear market regimes after initial volatility has subsided
entry_conditions: Classic turtle soup setup (false breakdown below support)
c4f4f5990e24.risk_management: Half normal position size for first 10 trades after implementing filter, then scale to full size based on performance
c4f4f5990e24.rationale: Bear markets often begin with genuine breakdowns, but once established, false breakouts become more common as oversold conditions create bounce opportunities

b2ca8ce62bb6.name: Bear_Momentum_Continuation
b2ca8ce62bb6.concept: Fade turtle soup reversals in bear markets by trading the continuation of the failed breakout
b2ca8ce62bb6.market_context: Bear market regimes with elevated volatility
entry_conditions: Wait 2-4 bars after turtle soup entry would have occurred
Enter short if price breaks below turtle soup entry level with volume > 1.1x average
exit_conditions: Stop: Price recovers above turtle soup trigger high
Target: 2x the turtle soup risk distance
Time: Close position at end of session if not stopped or targeted
b2ca8ce62bb6.risk_management: Position size = 50% of normal turtle soup allocation, maximum 3 concurrent positions
b2ca8ce62bb6.rationale: Exploits the bot's identified weakness by trading the opposite side when turtle soup patterns fail in bear markets, capitalizing on continuation momentum rather than fighting it.

0aff9459a13f.name: Adaptive_Bear_Soup
0aff9459a13f.concept: Dynamic position sizing for turtle soup patterns based on bear market sub-regime classification
0aff9459a13f.market_context: Bear markets with varying volatility and momentum characteristics
entry_conditions: Volatility-adjusted position sizing (0.25x to 1.0x based on VIX/momentum)
exit_conditions: Standard turtle soup targets with tighter stops in high-vol environments
Time decay exit after 3 days if no movement
0aff9459a13f.risk_management: Position size = base_size * (1 - normalized_vix) * momentum_factor, max 1.0x, min 0.25x
0aff9459a13f.rationale: Rather than avoiding profitable patterns entirely, this adapts to the risk characteristics of different bear market phases while maintaining strategic exposure.

dd213be3c3a2.name: Concern_Weight_Validator
dd213be3c3a2.concept: Dynamically adjust position sizing and execution speed based on the magnitude and type of pre-trade concerns noted by the system
dd213be3c3a2.market_context: All market regimes, especially choppy or transitional periods
entry_conditions: Standard setup criteria met for any base strategy
Concern severity score calculated from noted issues
Confidence level adjusted by concern weight multiplier
exit_conditions: Standard stop loss reduced by concern severity factor
Profit target reduced proportionally to maintain risk-reward ratio
Mandatory slow-path review if concerns exceed threshold mid-trade
dd213be3c3a2.risk_management: Position size = base_size * (1 - concern_severity_score), maximum 50% reduction
dd213be3c3a2.rationale: Systematically incorporating the bot's own doubt signals could improve risk-adjusted returns by preventing overexposure during uncertain setups

72d3d80694e9.name: Adaptive_Context_Sizing
72d3d80694e9.concept: Dynamically adjust position sizes based on historical context-specific performance rather than avoiding contexts entirely.
72d3d80694e9.market_context: Any regime where specific strategy-context combinations show persistent underperformance
entry_conditions: Context performance score calculated from rolling 50-trade window
exit_conditions: Emergency exit if context performance drops below 0.3 during trade
72d3d80694e9.risk_management: Maximum 20% of normal position size in underperforming contexts, with gradual scaling up as performance improves
72d3d80694e9.rationale: This allows the bot to maintain exposure to potentially valuable setups while protecting capital during periods of poor context performance, avoiding the binary on/off decision-making that may miss regime changes.

96c0833de65f.name: Bear_Soup_Fade
96c0833de65f.concept: Short failed turtle soup reversals during bear market regimes instead of going long
96c0833de65f.market_context: Bear market regimes with high volatility and negative momentum
entry_conditions: turtle_soup pattern identified (failed breakout with initial reversal)
exit_conditions: Stop loss at turtle soup reversal high + 0.5%
End of day exit if position held > 4 hours
96c0833de65f.risk_management: Position size limited to 1% account risk, maximum 3 concurrent positions
96c0833de65f.rationale: Systematically exploiting the bot's identified weakness by trading the opposite direction when turtle soup patterns consistently fail in bear markets

e5b5c3c63318.name: Regime_Adaptive_Turtle
e5b5c3c63318.concept: Dynamically flip turtle soup logic based on market regime strength
entry_conditions: Traditional turtle soup setup occurs (false breakout)
Instead of fading breakout, trade WITH the resumed trend direction
e5b5c3c63318.risk_management: Half normal position size for first 20 trades to validate hypothesis
e5b5c3c63318.rationale: If turtle soup fails because underlying momentum is too strong, trading with that momentum after the failed reversal could capture the continuation move.

00ee35670f66.name: Adaptive_Turtle_Soup_Filter
00ee35670f66.concept: Layer fundamental sentiment filters onto turtle soup setups to avoid value traps during bear markets
00ee35670f66.market_context: bear market regimes with high dispersion in sector performance
entry_conditions: Classic turtle soup setup (failed breakdown below support)
Sector relative strength > 0 (vs SPY over 10 days)
Volume on reversal day > 1.5x average daily volume
exit_conditions: Stop loss at 1.5x average true range below entry
Take profit at previous swing high or 2:1 risk/reward
Exit after 5 trading days regardless of P&L
00ee35670f66.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% of portfolio / (entry_price - stop_loss_price), maximum 2% portfolio risk per trade
00ee35670f66.rationale: Bear market turtle soup failures often occur in fundamentally weak sectors; filtering for relative strength and sentiment may identify genuine reversals versus dead cat bounces

cfa1462e8fe0.name: Concern_Weight_Adaptive
cfa1462e8fe0.concept: Dynamically adjust position sizing and confidence thresholds based on the presence and severity of noted concerns
cfa1462e8fe0.market_context: All market regimes, particularly when internal warning signals are present
entry_conditions: If concerns present, reduce position size by (concern_severity * 50%)
exit_conditions: Standard stop loss reduced by 25% when concerns were noted at entry
Take profit at 75% of normal target if concerns present
Immediate exit if new concerns emerge post-entry
cfa1462e8fe0.risk_management: Position size = base_size * (1 - concern_severity * 0.5), maximum 0.5R risk when concerns noted
cfa1462e8fe0.rationale: This strategy acknowledges that the bot's concern detection system contains valuable information that should directly influence trade execution rather than being overridden by pattern confidence.

f7ca3a5e34c0.name: Volatility_Regime_Filter
f7ca3a5e34c0.concept: Apply dynamic volatility-based filters to existing turtle soup signals to avoid low-probability setups.
exit_conditions: Take profit at 0.8x recent ATR (asymmetric for higher win rate)
f7ca3a5e34c0.risk_management: Position size inversely correlated to current volatility percentile; maximum 1% risk per trade
f7ca3a5e34c0.rationale: Filtering out high volatility periods should eliminate many of the false turtle soup signals that occur during genuine trend acceleration phases in bear markets.

b35b3757ddfd.name: Bear_Momentum_Fade
b35b3757ddfd.concept: Use failed turtle soup reversals as momentum continuation signals rather than fighting them
b35b3757ddfd.market_context: Bear market regimes with elevated volatility
entry_conditions: Regime = BEAR AND turtle_soup pattern identified
Price breaks below turtle_soup support level by >1%
exit_conditions: Stop loss: Return above turtle_soup resistance level
b35b3757ddfd.risk_management: Position size = 0.5x normal allocation given counter-trend nature of original signal
b35b3757ddfd.rationale: Instead of fighting the pattern failure, exploit it by riding the momentum that invalidated the reversal setup

1f6a51fb84f5.name: Bear_Momentum_Filter
1f6a51fb84f5.concept: Layer momentum confirmation on top of existing turtle soup signals during bear regimes
1f6a51fb84f5.market_context: Bear market conditions with high volatility and downtrend persistence
entry_conditions: Price within 3% of 20-day moving average support
exit_conditions: Stop: 1.5% below entry (tighter than bull market stops)
Target: 0.75% above entry (reduced target for bear market environment)
Time exit: Close position if no movement within 2 trading sessions
1f6a51fb84f5.risk_management: Half position size compared to bull market turtle soup trades; maximum 2% portfolio risk per trade
1f6a51fb84f5.rationale: Bear markets require more selective reversal trading with tighter risk controls and realistic profit expectations, filtering for only the highest-probability setups near technical support.

f586f148ec1b.name: Bear_Soup_Fade
f586f148ec1b.concept: Fade turtle soup breakouts in bear markets when volume and volatility conditions suggest false breakouts
f586f148ec1b.market_context: Bear market regimes with elevated volatility
exit_conditions: Time: Close position by 3:30 PM same day
f586f148ec1b.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% portfolio risk per trade, maximum 3 concurrent positions
f586f148ec1b.rationale: In bear markets, turtle soup patterns often represent institutional distribution rather than accumulation, creating reliable fade opportunities when volume confirms weak participation

ed8e0b84c480.name: Concern_Flag_Veto
ed8e0b84c480.concept: Automatically escalate to slow-path decision making when risk assessment modules flag concerns, regardless of pattern confidence.
ed8e0b84c480.market_context: All market regimes, particularly during regime transitions
entry_conditions: Confidence adjusted down by 20% for each active concern flag
exit_conditions: New concern flags trigger immediate position review
Maximum 50% of original position size if entered with active concerns
ed8e0b84c480.risk_management: Position size inversely correlated with number of concern flags; maximum 0.5R risk per trade with active concerns
ed8e0b84c480.rationale: Creates a systematic override for the overconfidence bias by forcing deliberation when the bot's own risk modules detect problems, potentially preventing the exact scenario described in this reflection.

9a5966a947a6.name: Volatility_Gated_Turtle_Soup
9a5966a947a6.concept: Only trade turtle soup reversals when volatility conditions support meaningful counter-moves
9a5966a947a6.market_context: any regime, but with volatility filtering
entry_conditions: Volume spike > 1.3x average on the false breakout
Entry within first 2 hours of market open
exit_conditions: Stop loss at 1.5x ATR beyond breakout level
Target at 2x ATR in reversal direction
Exit at market close if position held > 4 hours
9a5966a947a6.risk_management: Position size = 1% portfolio risk per trade, maximum 3 concurrent turtle soup positions
9a5966a947a6.rationale: The bot's turtle soup failures may stem from trading in low-volatility environments where reversals lack conviction; gating entries on volatility and volume should improve edge

af01586babc9.name: Bear_Volatility_Fade
af01586babc9.concept: Fade extreme intraday moves in bear markets when volatility expansion exceeds historical norms
af01586babc9.market_context: Bear market regimes with elevated intraday volatility
entry_conditions: price moves > 2 standard deviations from VWAP
af01586babc9.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% of portfolio, max 3 concurrent positions
af01586babc9.rationale: Bear markets often see emotional selling creating temporary dislocations that revert as institutional buyers step in at extreme levels

8eabc3567c76.name: Adaptive_Turtle_Soup
8eabc3567c76.concept: Dynamic position sizing for turtle soup based on volatility regime and recent failure rate
8eabc3567c76.market_context: Bear markets with elevated volatility where traditional turtle soup shows degraded performance
entry_conditions: Traditional turtle soup setup (false breakout identification)
Recent turtle soup failure rate < 60% over last 10 trades
Position size = base_size * (1 - volatility_penalty) where volatility_penalty = min(0.7, realized_vol/historical_vol - 1)
exit_conditions: Stop loss at 1.5x normal distance during high volatility periods
Take profit at 0.75x normal target to account for reduced edge
Maximum hold time reduced to 2/3 normal duration
8eabc3567c76.risk_management: Maximum 0.5% risk per trade in bear/high-vol regimes, with mandatory 24-hour cooldown after 3 consecutive losses
8eabc3567c76.rationale: Rather than abandoning turtle soup entirely, this adapts to market conditions by reducing exposure and adjusting parameters, potentially salvaging edge while limiting downside

b5c8c57bd54d.name: Regime_Shift_Detector
b5c8c57bd54d.concept: Identify when market microstructure changes invalidate technical patterns before entering trades.
b5c8c57bd54d.market_context: Transitional periods between bull/bear regimes or during volatility regime shifts
entry_conditions: Traditional technical setup present (e.g., turtle_soup, breakout, etc.)
Market microstructure health score > 0.7 (composite of spread, volume, correlation metrics)
Regime stability indicator confirms current market phase for 3+ days
b5c8c57bd54d.risk_management: Position size inversely correlated with regime uncertainty; maximum 1% risk per trade during transitional periods
b5c8c57bd54d.rationale: Technical patterns fail when underlying market structure changes; monitoring microstructure health can prevent entering trades in deteriorating conditions that statistical models miss.

a064eae7a7b5.name: Concern_Weight_Adaptive
a064eae7a7b5.concept: Dynamically adjust position sizing and confidence thresholds based on internal concern flag intensity and market regime volatility.
a064eae7a7b5.market_context: All market conditions, but particularly choppy/uncertain regimes
entry_conditions: Concern flag weight < 30% for full position, 30-60% for half position
exit_conditions: Stop loss at 0.5R if concern flags increase post-entry
Standard pattern target if concern flags remain low
Time-based exit after 5 bars if concern flags rise above entry threshold
a064eae7a7b5.rationale: The bot's own concern mechanisms appear to contain valuable information that's being underutilized; systematically incorporating this internal "intuition" could improve risk-adjusted returns by reducing position sizes when the system itself is uncertain.

9ea4313cb51e.name: Adaptive_Regime_Filter
9ea4313cb51e.concept: Dynamically exclude or reduce exposure to strategy-regime combinations with persistent negative performance
9ea4313cb51e.market_context: Any regime where specific strategy patterns show sustained underperformance
entry_conditions: Calculate rolling 30-day win rate for each strategy-regime combination
Only execute trades when strategy-regime win rate > 55%
Apply 50% position size reduction when win rate between 45-55%
exit_conditions: Force exit if strategy-regime win rate drops below 40% intraday
9ea4313cb51e.risk_management: Dynamic position sizing based on strategy-regime historical performance with maximum 25% allocation to any underperforming combination
9ea4313cb51e.rationale: Market regimes can fundamentally alter strategy effectiveness; adaptive filtering prevents persistent exposure to deteriorating strategy-context combinations while preserving capital for favorable setups.

1b74ef959358.name: Bear_Regime_Momentum_Filter
1b74ef959358.concept: Layer momentum confirmation filters on top of existing turtle soup signals during bear markets
1b74ef959358.market_context: bear market regimes with elevated volatility
entry_conditions: VIX term structure in backwardation (indicating short-term fear spike rather than persistent bearishness)
exit_conditions: Stop: 1.5x normal turtle soup stop distance
Target: 0.75x normal turtle soup target (taking profits earlier)
Time: Exit if position not profitable within 3 days
1b74ef959358.risk_management: Reduce position size by 50% in bear regimes, maximum 3 concurrent turtle soup positions
1b74ef959358.rationale: Bear markets require more selective turtle soup entries—only taking setups when short-term momentum isn't severely negative and volatility structure suggests temporary rather than structural fear

74ca172af416.name: Regime_Transition_Detector
74ca172af416.concept: Identify and trade regime uncertainty rather than assuming regime stability
74ca172af416.market_context: periods of high regime uncertainty and volatility clustering
entry_conditions: multiple timeframe divergence in trend indicators
exit_conditions: 3-day profit target of 2x average daily range
74ca172af416.risk_management: position size = 0.5x normal during uncertainty periods, maximum 3 concurrent positions
74ca172af416.rationale: Rather than avoiding uncertain periods, this strategy capitalizes on the increased volatility and mean reversion tendencies that occur when markets struggle to establish clear directional trends.

ad65e387b9f5.name: Volatility_Regime_Filter
ad65e387b9f5.concept: Dynamically adjust turtle soup exposure based on volatility regime and recent strategy performance
ad65e387b9f5.market_context: Bear markets with varying volatility conditions
entry_conditions: VIX percentile > 30 OR recent turtle soup win rate > 50% over last 10 trades
No more than 2 consecutive turtle soup losses in past 5 trades
exit_conditions: VIX drops below 20th percentile (low vol regime entry)
3rd consecutive loss triggers 5-day turtle soup moratorium
ad65e387b9f5.risk_management: Reduce position size by 50% if recent turtle soup win rate < 40%, maximum 2% portfolio risk per trade
ad65e387b9f5.rationale: Turtle soup relies on volatility-driven reversals; filtering for appropriate volatility regimes and implementing performance-based cooling-off periods should improve edge preservation.

da938b446f11.name: Confidence_Decay_Filter
da938b446f11.concept: Dynamically reduce position sizing when confidence exceeds regime-appropriate thresholds
da938b446f11.market_context: All market regimes, but especially choppy/transitional periods
entry_conditions: Confidence level adjusted by market regime multiplier (CHOPPY = 0.6x, TRENDING = 1.2x)
exit_conditions: Force exit if confidence was >70% and trade moves >0.3R against position
Time-based exit after 2x expected holding period if confidence was >80%
da938b446f11.risk_management: Maximum 0.5R risk per trade when original confidence >60%, standard 1R otherwise
da938b446f11.rationale: Overconfidence appears to be a systematic bias; this strategy explicitly penalizes high confidence in uncertain environments while preserving upside in clear trending conditions

4861ff2df74f.name: Bear_Momentum_Fade
4861ff2df74f.concept: Use turtle soup failures as continuation signals rather than reversal opportunities in sustained bear markets.
4861ff2df74f.market_context: Bear regimes lasting more than 5 consecutive days with declining volume
entry_conditions: Turtle soup pattern fails within 2 bars of setup
Volume declining on each successive low
exit_conditions: Target: 1.5x average daily range from entry
4861ff2df74f.risk_management: Position size 50% of normal allocation due to counter-intuitive nature; maximum 3 concurrent positions
4861ff2df74f.rationale: Failed reversals in weak markets often signal continuation moves as trapped bulls capitulate, creating momentum opportunities in the direction of the prevailing trend.

e730011222a8.name: Regime_Adaptive_Turtle_Soup
e730011222a8.concept: Dynamic turtle soup reversal strategy that adjusts entry thresholds and position sizing based on market regime volatility
e730011222a8.market_context: All market regimes with enhanced bear market modifications
entry_conditions: Classic turtle soup setup (false breakdown below support)
RSI_2 < (20 - regime_volatility_adjustment) where adjustment = 5 in BEAR, 0 in BULL
exit_conditions: Stop: 1.5% below entry in BEAR markets, 1% in BULL markets
Time-based: Exit after 3 trading days if no momentum
e730011222a8.risk_management: Position size = base_size * (1 - regime_volatility_percentile/100), maximum 0.5% portfolio risk per trade
e730011222a8.rationale: Bear markets require deeper oversold conditions and tighter risk management, while the core turtle soup logic remains valid with proper regime adaptation

a50251df7a82.name: Bear_Momentum_Filter
a50251df7a82.concept: Apply momentum filters to turtle soup setups in bear markets to distinguish between false signals and genuine reversals.
a50251df7a82.market_context: Bear market regimes with high volatility
entry_conditions: Traditional turtle soup setup (false breakout below support)
VIX declining from recent high (fear subsiding)
exit_conditions: Stop: 1.5x average daily range below entry
Target: Return to broken support level
a50251df7a82.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% portfolio risk, maximum 3 concurrent positions
a50251df7a82.rationale: Bear markets create noise in turtle soup signals; momentum and volume filters can identify when selling pressure is genuinely exhausted versus temporary pauses in downtrends.

eb109abcdad9.name: Bear_Sentiment_Filter
eb109abcdad9.concept: Layer sentiment indicators onto existing turtle soup setups to filter out low-probability trades in bear markets.
eb109abcdad9.market_context: Bear market regimes with high volatility and negative sentiment
entry_conditions: VIX term structure in contango (fear subsiding)
exit_conditions: Stop: 1.5x average true range below entry
Time: Close position if no movement within 3 trading sessions
eb109abcdad9.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% of portfolio risk per trade, maximum 3 concurrent positions
eb109abcdad9.rationale: Bear markets create persistent downward pressure that can invalidate traditional reversal setups, but filtering for reduced bearish sentiment and weak volume can identify higher-probability opportunities when selling pressure temporarily exhausts.

5c7215d41ba4.name: Concern_Weight_Calibrator
5c7215d41ba4.concept: Dynamically adjust position sizing based on the ratio of confidence to internal concern signals
5c7215d41ba4.market_context: all market regimes, particularly when pattern confidence and concern flags conflict
entry_conditions: Only enter if concern_ratio < 0.3, otherwise reduce position size by 50%
exit_conditions: Reduce position by 50% if new concern flags emerge post-entry
Take profits at 0.5R if concern_ratio increases above 0.4
5c7215d41ba4.risk_management: Base position size inversely correlated to concern_ratio; maximum 0.5R risk when concern_ratio > 0.2
5c7215d41ba4.rationale: The bot's concern detection appears more reliable than its confidence calibration, so weighting decisions toward concern signals may improve risk-adjusted returns

0f6771ee1220.name: Adaptive_Turtle_Filter
0f6771ee1220.concept: Use multiple timeframe momentum divergence to filter turtle soup setups in bear markets
0f6771ee1220.market_context: Bear market regimes with high false breakout noise
entry_conditions: volume_profile shows accumulation at support level
exit_conditions: Time: Exit after 3 trading sessions if no momentum
0f6771ee1220.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% account risk, maximum 3 concurrent turtle positions
0f6771ee1220.rationale: Bear market turtle soup fails because it fights the trend, but momentum divergence across timeframes can identify genuine reversal points where the strategy's contrarian nature becomes an advantage

072604841d71.name: Adaptive_Pattern_Decay
072604841d71.concept: Dynamically adjust strategy allocation based on real-time pattern degradation signals across multiple timeframes.
072604841d71.market_context: Any regime where traditional technical patterns show declining effectiveness
entry_conditions: Pattern win rate drops below historical average by 2+ standard deviations over rolling 20-trade window
Cross-validate pattern failure across 3+ different timeframes (1H, 4H, daily)
Market microstructure shows increased algorithmic activity (bid-ask spread compression + volume surge)
exit_conditions: Pattern win rate recovers to historical mean
Alternative pattern shows 15%+ higher win rate over same period
072604841d71.risk_management: Reduce position size by 50% when pattern degradation detected, maximum 2% risk per trade
072604841d71.rationale: Technical patterns lose effectiveness as they become widely known; this strategy adapts by detecting when patterns are being arbitraged away and rotating to less crowded opportunities.

cdc5987762ab.name: Regime_Transition_Filter
cdc5987762ab.concept: Dynamically adjust strategy exposure based on regime stability metrics rather than binary regime classification.
cdc5987762ab.market_context: All market conditions, with emphasis on transition periods
entry_conditions: Cross-validation with volatility term structure alignment
exit_conditions: Maximum 5-day holding period during unstable regimes
cdc5987762ab.risk_management: Reduce position size by 50% when regime stability < 0.6, halt new entries when < 0.3
cdc5987762ab.rationale: Many strategy failures occur during regime transitions when historical patterns break down; filtering for regime stability should improve risk-adjusted returns across all strategies.

5a3a5de19feb.name: Bear_Momentum_Continuation
5a3a5de19feb.concept: Trade with the bear market trend after failed turtle soup setups rather than against it
5a3a5de19feb.market_context: bear market regimes with failed reversal patterns
entry_conditions: Turtle soup pattern identified but fails within 2 bars
exit_conditions: Stop: Price moves back above turtle soup high
Target: 2x the initial turtle soup range
5a3a5de19feb.risk_management: Position size = 0.5x normal turtle soup allocation, maximum 2% account risk
5a3a5de19feb.rationale: If turtle soup reversals consistently fail in bear markets, the failure itself becomes a signal to trade with the dominant trend rather than against it

ba9d8723aa7e.name: Concern_Weighted_Filter
ba9d8723aa7e.concept: Dynamically adjust position sizing and entry timing based on the number and severity of pre-trade concerns identified by the system.
ba9d8723aa7e.market_context: All market regimes, particularly when multiple conflicting signals are present
entry_conditions: Base pattern signal triggers (e.g., turtle_soup setup)
If concern score 3-6, reduce position size by 50%
exit_conditions: Immediate exit if new concerns emerge post-entry
Tighter stops (0.5R instead of 1R) when concern score was elevated at entry
ba9d8723aa7e.risk_management: Position size inversely correlated with concern score; maximum 0.5R risk when concerns are present
ba9d8723aa7e.rationale: The bot already identifies valid concerns but ignores them - this strategy monetizes that existing capability by treating concerns as quantifiable risk factors rather than mere warnings.

2df0cfc972d9.name: Adaptive_Fear_Filter
2df0cfc972d9.concept: Layer volatility regime filtering onto existing reversal strategies to avoid trading during extreme fear periods
exit_conditions: vix spikes above entry_vix * 1.3 (fear escalation stop)
2df0cfc972d9.rationale: Combines the bot's existing reversal logic with macro fear indicators to avoid trading when fundamental selling pressure overwhelms technical signals

9d5fc7ad15c6.name: Regime_Aware_Turtle_Filter
9d5fc7ad15c6.concept: Apply turtle soup patterns only when market microstructure supports mean reversion over momentum.
9d5fc7ad15c6.market_context: All market regimes with dynamic pattern filtering
entry_conditions: No major support/resistance level within 2% of entry
exit_conditions: Stop loss at 1.5x average true range
Target at 0.8x of the false breakout range
Maximum hold time of 3 trading sessions
9d5fc7ad15c6.risk_management: Position size inversely correlated with regime momentum score; maximum 2% risk per trade
9d5fc7ad15c6.rationale: This strategy addresses the bot's core weakness by filtering turtle soup setups through regime analysis, avoiding the pattern when market structure favors continuation over reversal.

e8b6f99e9098.name: Bear_Market_Turtle_Refinement
e8b6f99e9098.concept: Apply volume-weighted timing filters to turtle soup setups specifically during bear market regimes
e8b6f99e9098.market_context: Bear markets with high volatility and frequent false breakouts
entry_conditions: Turtle soup pattern identified (false breakdown below support)
Bear market regime confirmed (SPY < 50-day MA for >20 days)
exit_conditions: Time exit: Close position after 3 trading days if no movement
e8b6f99e9098.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% account risk, maximum 3 concurrent turtle soup positions in bear markets
e8b6f99e9098.rationale: Low-volume breakdowns in bear markets often represent exhaustion rather than institutional selling, creating higher probability reversal opportunities with defined risk parameters

b24133bb1ba5.name: Regime_Adaptive_Turtle
b24133bb1ba5.concept: Dynamically adjust turtle soup entry criteria based on market regime and volatility environment
b24133bb1ba5.market_context: All market regimes with enhanced filtering during bear markets
entry_conditions: IF regime = BEAR: require volume > 2x average AND RSI divergence confirmation
IF regime = BULL: standard volume confirmation (1.2x average)
exit_conditions: Stop loss: 1.5x ATR from entry in bear markets, 1x ATR in bull markets
Time exit: Close position if no movement within first 2 hours
b24133bb1ba5.risk_management: Position size = 0.5x normal during bear markets, standard size during bull markets
b24133bb1ba5.rationale: Bear markets require higher conviction signals due to increased false breakout probability, while maintaining opportunity capture in favorable regimes

a77497f71841.name: Confidence_Calibration_Filter
a77497f71841.concept: Reduce position size when confidence exceeds historical accuracy by more than 20%
a77497f71841.market_context: All market regimes, particularly when model confidence is high
exit_conditions: Additional stop if confidence drops below 40% mid-trade
a77497f71841.risk_management: Dynamic position sizing based on confidence-accuracy spread; maximum 0.5R risk when overconfident
a77497f71841.rationale: Overconfidence often precedes large losses; reducing size during miscalibrated high-confidence periods should improve risk-adjusted returns while maintaining upside participation.

b70264a691ec.name: Regime_Adaptive_Turtle_Soup
b70264a691ec.concept: Dynamically adjust turtle soup position sizing and holding periods based on momentum regime strength rather than binary on/off switching.
b70264a691ec.market_context: All market regimes, with particular focus on bear/high-momentum periods
entry_conditions: Traditional turtle soup setup (failed breakout with reversal signal)
exit_conditions: Stop loss: 1.5x normal distance in high ADX environments
Profit target: Scale out 50% at 0.5R, remainder at 1.5R
Time exit: 3 days maximum in BEAR regime, 5 days otherwise
b70264a691ec.risk_management: Maximum 0.5% account risk per trade in BEAR regime, 1% in others; no more than 3 concurrent turtle soup positions
b70264a691ec.rationale: Rather than abandoning a potentially profitable pattern, this adapts to regime characteristics while maintaining systematic exposure to the edge.

35f85ca01091.name: Bear_Soup_Fade
35f85ca01091.concept: Use failed turtle soup signals in bear markets as momentum continuation entries rather than reversal plays
35f85ca01091.market_context: Bear regime with elevated volatility and clear downtrend
entry_conditions: Turtle soup setup triggers but fails within first 30 minutes
Price breaks below turtle soup stop level
exit_conditions: Target: 1.5x the original turtle soup risk distance
Stop: Return above turtle soup trigger level
35f85ca01091.risk_management: Half normal position size due to trend-following nature in volatile conditions
35f85ca01091.rationale: In bear markets, failed reversals often become powerful continuation signals as trapped longs capitulate, creating exploitable momentum

bf682b19b3c9.name: Bear_Momentum_Confirmation
bf682b19b3c9.concept: Trade with momentum in bear markets instead of against it when traditional reversal signals appear
bf682b19b3c9.market_context: Bear market regimes with high volatility and sustained downtrends
entry_conditions: regime = BEAR AND turtle_soup signal triggers
Price breaks below turtle_soup entry level by >0.5%
exit_conditions: Stop loss at turtle_soup original entry level (+1.5% from entry)
Profit target at next significant support level (-3% to -5%)
Time-based exit after 3 trading days if no clear direction
bf682b19b3c9.risk_management: Half normal position size, maximum 2% portfolio risk per trade
bf682b19b3c9.rationale: Instead of fighting bear market momentum with turtle soup fades, this strategy capitalizes on the regime's tendency for follow-through by trading confirmed breakdowns.

2fc716d0edd4.name: Bear_Momentum_Filter
2fc716d0edd4.concept: Disable turtle soup reversals during sustained bear momentum and pivot to trend-following entries
2fc716d0edd4.market_context: Bear markets with high momentum persistence
entry_conditions: Price breaks below turtle soup reversal level with volume confirmation
exit_conditions: Price reclaims turtle soup reversal level
2fc716d0edd4.risk_management: Half normal position size, 1% max risk per trade
2fc716d0edd4.rationale: Instead of fighting bear market momentum with reversals, this strategy captures the continuation moves that break turtle soup patterns, turning the bot's weakness into a directional advantage.

abe711c20ab8.name: Confidence_Decay_Filter
abe711c20ab8.concept: Dynamically reduce position size when confidence model shows recent calibration errors
abe711c20ab8.market_context: All market regimes, especially after sequence of overconfident losing trades
entry_conditions: Confidence calibration error in last 10 trades < 0.15
If calibration error > 0.15, reduce position size by 50%
exit_conditions: Emergency exit if confidence error exceeds 0.3 mid-trade
abe711c20ab8.risk_management: Position size inversely correlated with recent confidence errors; maximum 0.5R risk when calibration is poor
abe711c20ab8.rationale: Creates a feedback loop that forces the system to rebuild confidence accuracy before taking larger risks

528999a35490.name: Bear_Bounce_Turtle
528999a35490.concept: Trade turtle soup patterns in bear markets only when multiple oversold conditions align with institutional support levels.
528999a35490.market_context: Bear market regimes with elevated volatility
entry_conditions: Price within 2% of major institutional support (200MA, previous major low)
528999a35490.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% of portfolio per trade, maximum 3 concurrent positions
528999a35490.rationale: Bear market turtle soup patterns near major support with extreme oversold readings often mark short-term capitulation points where institutional buying emerges.

cfffee1e42c2.name: Regime_Aware_Turtle_Soup
cfffee1e42c2.concept: Dynamically adjust turtle soup reversal signals based on market regime strength and volume characteristics
cfffee1e42c2.market_context: All market regimes with enhanced filtering for bear markets
entry_conditions: Traditional turtle soup setup (false breakout reversal)
In BEAR regime: require RSI < 30 AND volume < 0.8x 10-day average
In BULL/NEUTRAL: standard turtle soup criteria
exit_conditions: Stop: 1.5x average true range from entry
Time exit: Close position if no movement toward target within 5 days
cfffee1e42c2.risk_management: Position size = base_size * (1 - consecutive_losses_in_context * 0.15), maximum 3 consecutive attempts per context
cfffee1e42c2.rationale: Bear markets require higher conviction signals with lower volume confirmation, while position sizing should adapt to context-specific performance degradation

ac23866d0c51.name: Volatility_Regime_Turtle_Filter
ac23866d0c51.concept: Only trade turtle soup reversals when volatility regime suggests mean reversion is more likely than trend continuation
ac23866d0c51.market_context: Bear markets with mixed volatility signals
entry_conditions: Traditional turtle soup setup (failed breakout below support)
RSI(14) < 35 but showing positive divergence with price
No major earnings or Fed events within 2 days
exit_conditions: Stop loss: 1.5x average daily range below entry
Target: 0.8x average daily range above entry
Time exit: Close position at end of day if no movement toward target
ac23866d0c51.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% of portfolio when VIX > 25, 1% when VIX < 20
ac23866d0c51.rationale: Turtle soup works best when volatility fear is elevated but not in panic mode, and term structure suggests volatility will decline, supporting mean reversion over continued selling pressure.

5d1d4701741e.name: Momentum_Confirmation_Filter
5d1d4701741e.concept: Layer momentum confirmation on top of existing reversal signals to avoid counter-trend trades during strong directional moves.
5d1d4701741e.market_context: Bear market regimes with sustained directional pressure
entry_conditions: ADX < 20 (weak trend) OR price above 20-day EMA (momentum divergence)
RSI between 30-70 (avoid extreme oversold in bear markets)
exit_conditions: ADX > 30 and price momentum accelerates against position
Maximum 3-day hold period in bear regimes
5d1d4701741e.risk_management: Reduce position size by 50% when VIX > 25, implement tighter stops (1.5x ATR vs standard 2x ATR)
5d1d4701741e.rationale: Bear markets often exhibit persistent momentum that invalidates reversal patterns; filtering for weak momentum conditions should improve the reliability of counter-trend entries.

2eb6ce86e222.name: Confidence_Volatility_Hedge
2eb6ce86e222.concept: Dynamically reduce position size when bot confidence exceeds market volatility-adjusted thresholds
2eb6ce86e222.market_context: All market regimes, particularly choppy and transitional periods
entry_conditions: Bot generates trade signal with confidence > 60%
Calculate volatility-adjusted confidence ceiling (base_confidence - volatility_multiplier * recent_ATR)
If bot confidence exceeds ceiling, reduce position size by (excess_confidence / 100)
exit_conditions: Emergency exit if realized volatility exceeds 2x expected volatility
2eb6ce86e222.risk_management: Position size = base_size * (1 - confidence_penalty) where confidence_penalty scales with overconfidence
2eb6ce86e222.rationale: Overconfidence in volatile markets is a systematic bias; this strategy exploits the bot's own behavioral patterns by using its confidence as a contrarian signal for position sizing.

cd9c1d315188.name: Regime_Transition_Detector
cd9c1d315188.concept: Exploit the bot's own adaptation lag during market regime changes by fading its high-confidence trades immediately post-transition.
cd9c1d315188.market_context: First 5-15 trading days after confirmed regime shifts
entry_conditions: Bot confidence score > 0.8 on primary strategy
cd9c1d315188.risk_management: Maximum 0.5% portfolio risk per trade, maximum 3 concurrent positions
cd9c1d315188.rationale: Trading bots often maintain stale parameters during regime transitions, creating predictable failure patterns that can be systematically exploited.

5d24c11af3e9.name: Bear_Momentum_Continuation
5d24c11af3e9.concept: Fade turtle soup reversals during bear regimes by trading in the direction of the failed breakout
5d24c11af3e9.market_context: Bear market regimes with high volatility
entry_conditions: Turtle soup pattern identified (false breakout above resistance)
Volume confirms breakout failure within 2-3 bars
Enter short position in direction of failed breakout
exit_conditions: Stop loss: 1.5x the false breakout range above entry
Target: 2x the false breakout range below entry
Time exit: Close position if no movement within 5 trading sessions
5d24c11af3e9.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% account risk per trade, maximum 3 concurrent positions
5d24c11af3e9.rationale: In bear markets, failed breakouts often lead to accelerated moves in the opposite direction as trapped longs capitulate, creating momentum continuation opportunities

3cba2ff863c4.name: Regime_Aware_Reversal
3cba2ff863c4.concept: Apply turtle soup patterns only when market microstructure supports mean reversion over momentum continuation.
3cba2ff863c4.market_context: Bear markets with high volatility but showing signs of exhaustion
entry_conditions: Price below 20-day MA but RSI(2) < 15 (technical oversold)
exit_conditions: Time: Exit after 3 days regardless of P&L
3cba2ff863c4.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% of portfolio, reduced to 0.25% if 3+ recent losses in bear/turtle_soup context
3cba2ff863c4.rationale: Combines turtle soup logic with regime-specific filters to avoid false signals during persistent directional moves, while capitalizing on genuine exhaustion reversals.

d9a67ae3b306.name: Bear_Momentum_Fade
d9a67ae3b306.concept: Instead of fighting bear market momentum with turtle soup, fade extreme intraday moves after initial capitulation.
d9a67ae3b306.market_context: Bear market regimes with high volatility
entry_conditions: Intraday decline > 2 standard deviations from 10-day mean
exit_conditions: Take profit at 50% retracement of the day's range
Stop loss at new intraday low
Exit at market close regardless of P&L
d9a67ae3b306.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% of portfolio per trade, maximum 2 concurrent positions
d9a67ae3b306.rationale: Bear markets create oversold bounces after capitulation events, but these are temporary - this strategy captures relief rallies while respecting the dominant trend.

9e47c92ee1bb.name: Regime_Filtered_Reversals
9e47c92ee1bb.concept: Apply reversal patterns only when market regime supports the underlying mechanism
9e47c92ee1bb.market_context: trending markets with clear directional bias
entry_conditions: Classic reversal pattern detected (turtle soup, failed breakout, etc.)
Market regime = TRENDING (not CHOPPY or SIDEWAYS)
Pattern occurs against established trend direction
exit_conditions: Stop: 1.5x average true range beyond pattern trigger
Target: Return to trend channel or 2R profit
Time-based: Exit if no movement within 5 bars
9e47c92ee1bb.risk_management: Position size inversely proportional to regime uncertainty; reduce size 50% in transitional regimes
9e47c92ee1bb.rationale: Reversal patterns rely on failed momentum, which requires an established directional context to fail meaningfully - choppy markets provide false signals

ed68da4f9205.name: Bear_Momentum_Continuation
ed68da4f9205.concept: Instead of fading breakouts in bear markets, ride the momentum with tight risk management
ed68da4f9205.market_context: Bear regime with VIX > 20 and declining 50-day moving average
entry_conditions: Price breaks below previous support level (turtle soup setup trigger)
exit_conditions: Stop: 1.5% above entry (tight due to bear market volatility)
Time: Close position if held > 3 days without progress
ed68da4f9205.risk_management: Position size = 0.5x normal allocation due to higher volatility; maximum 3 concurrent positions
ed68da4f9205.rationale: Rather than fighting the bear market momentum that kills turtle soup reversals, this strategy capitalizes on the same forces by riding the continuation of breakdowns

105afda53f0c.name: Adaptive_Context_Filter
105afda53f0c.concept: Dynamically adjust strategy exposure based on rolling context-specific performance metrics rather than binary on/off decisions.
105afda53f0c.market_context: All market regimes with sufficient historical context data
entry_conditions: Context-specific win rate > 0.5 over last 20 trades
Current drawdown in context < 2x historical average
exit_conditions: Context win rate drops below 0.4 over rolling window
105afda53f0c.risk_management: Position size scales from 0.25x to 1.5x based on context performance percentile; maximum 2% risk per trade
105afda53f0c.rationale: Rather than avoiding problematic contexts entirely, this approach allows for adaptive learning and prevents the bot from missing regime changes while protecting against persistent underperformance.

230c3d0e1b90.name: Regime_Adaptive_Turtle
230c3d0e1b90.concept: Dynamically adjust turtle soup parameters based on market regime and volatility context
230c3d0e1b90.market_context: All market regimes with regime-specific parameter sets
entry_conditions: False breakout detected (standard turtle soup setup)
Regime-adjusted volatility filter (higher threshold in BEAR markets)
Volume confirmation divergence from breakout direction
exit_conditions: 1.5x ATR profit target (reduced from standard 2x in BEAR regimes)
0.75x ATR stop loss (tighter in BEAR regimes)
Maximum 4-hour holding period in BEAR markets
230c3d0e1b90.risk_management: Reduce position size by 50% in BEAR/turtle_soup combinations; implement regime-based Kelly criterion sizing
230c3d0e1b90.rationale: Rather than avoiding turtle soup in bear markets entirely, this adapts the strategy to the regime's characteristics, potentially capturing opportunities the bot is currently abandoning while managing the identified risk pattern.

d3e9d265343b.name: Regime_Adaptive_Turtle_Soup
d3e9d265343b.concept: Dynamically adjust turtle soup strategy parameters based on market regime and momentum strength
d3e9d265343b.market_context: All market regimes, with parameter adaptation
entry_conditions: Regime-adjusted confidence threshold met (higher threshold in BEAR markets)
exit_conditions: Exit after 3 days if no movement
d3e9d265343b.risk_management: Position size = base_size * regime_multiplier * (1 - ADX/50), maximum 1% account risk
d3e9d265343b.rationale: Rather than abandoning turtle soup in bear markets, this adapts the strategy's aggressiveness to match regime characteristics and momentum conditions.

bdfaf3cc738d.name: Concern_Weighted_Confidence
bdfaf3cc738d.concept: Dynamically adjust position sizing based on the ratio of pattern confidence to internal concern signals
bdfaf3cc738d.market_context: All market regimes, particularly when pattern recognition conflicts with risk assessment
exit_conditions: Stop loss at 0.5R if concern signals increase by >20% post-entry
Take profit at 1.5R if concern signals remain stable
Time-based exit after 5 bars if no clear resolution
bdfaf3cc738d.risk_management: Maximum position size capped at 50% of normal when concern signals exceed 30%
bdfaf3cc738d.rationale: This strategy addresses the bot's core issue of ignoring its own risk assessment by making concern signals a direct input to position sizing and exit timing, potentially improving risk-adjusted returns.

ffff4497c15f.name: Bear_Momentum_Fade
ffff4497c15f.concept: Fade turtle soup setups in bear markets by trading WITH the failed reversal
ffff4497c15f.market_context: Bear market regimes where traditional reversal strategies are failing
entry_conditions: Turtle soup setup triggers but fails within first 2 hours
Price breaks back below/above the false breakout level with increased volume
RSI shows continued momentum in trending direction
exit_conditions: Target: Next major support/resistance level (typically 2-3% move)
Time: Close position at end of trading day
ffff4497c15f.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% portfolio risk per trade, maximum 3 concurrent positions
ffff4497c15f.rationale: If turtle soup consistently fails in bear markets, there's likely alpha in trading the continuation move that kills the reversal attempt, essentially becoming the predator rather than the prey.

966bd1f78976.name: Bear_Volatility_Fade
966bd1f78976.concept: Fade extreme intraday moves in bear markets when volatility exceeds regime norms
966bd1f78976.market_context: bear market regimes with elevated volatility
entry_conditions: price moves >2% intraday in either direction
exit_conditions: stop loss at 1.5x initial move extension
966bd1f78976.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% account risk, maximum 3 concurrent positions
966bd1f78976.rationale: Bear markets often feature emotional overreactions that create mean reversion opportunities within the broader downtrend, especially when volatility spikes signal capitulation events.

d7ba888a4603.name: Bear_Trap_Momentum
d7ba888a4603.concept: In bear regimes, fade the fade - trade in direction of failed turtle soup reversals
d7ba888a4603.market_context: Bear markets with high volatility and strong downtrends
entry_conditions: turtle_soup pattern identified but showing signs of failure (price re-breaking support within 2-3 bars)
exit_conditions: Stop: 1.5% above entry (tight given expected momentum)
Target: Next significant support level or 3:1 risk-reward
Time exit: Close position if no movement within 5 trading sessions
d7ba888a4603.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% account risk given higher probability setup, maximum 3 concurrent positions
d7ba888a4603.rationale: Bear markets punish counter-trend trades severely; this strategy capitalizes on the bot's observed failure pattern by trading the continuation rather than fighting it

171a51d9363c.name: Bear_Momentum_Filter
171a51d9363c.concept: Apply momentum filters to traditional reversal strategies during bear regimes to avoid catching falling knives.
171a51d9363c.market_context: Bear market regimes with high downside momentum
entry_conditions: Price above 20-day MA or within 2% of recent support
exit_conditions: Target: 2.5% above entry or resistance level
171a51d9363c.risk_management: Reduce position size by 50% in bear regimes, maximum 2% portfolio risk per trade
171a51d9363c.rationale: Bear markets require higher conviction for reversal trades; momentum and volume filters help identify genuine exhaustion points rather than temporary pauses in downtrends.

2b8a32387ffe.name: Confidence_Regime_Filter
2b8a32387ffe.concept: Dynamically adjust pattern confidence thresholds based on market regime compatibility scores.
2b8a32387ffe.market_context: All market conditions, but particularly choppy/transitional regimes
2b8a32387ffe.risk_management: Position size inversely proportional to (1 - regime_compatibility_score); maximum 1R risk
2b8a32387ffe.rationale: Market regimes fundamentally alter pattern reliability, so confidence should be regime-adjusted rather than absolute. This creates a more adaptive and context-aware trading approach.
