3551dd266a29.name: Regime_Aware_Turtle_Filter
3551dd266a29.concept: Apply turtle soup patterns only when market microstructure supports genuine reversals rather than institutional distribution.
3551dd266a29.market_context: All market regimes, but with dynamic filtering based on regime characteristics
entry_conditions: Regime-specific volume profile confirms pattern validity (bear: low institutional flow, bull: high retail participation)
Options flow supports reversal direction (put/call ratio divergence)
3551dd266a29.risk_management: Position size inversely correlated with regime uncertainty score; maximum 1% risk per trade
3551dd266a29.rationale: The bot's turtle soup failures likely stem from regime-blind application; filtering based on underlying market structure should improve pattern reliability while maintaining the core contrarian edge.

8614199f7ec0.name: Regime_Adaptive_Turtle
8614199f7ec0.concept: Dynamically adjust turtle soup entry thresholds based on market regime strength
8614199f7ec0.market_context: All market regimes with regime-specific parameter sets
entry_conditions: False breakout beyond previous high/low (standard turtle soup)
Regime-adjusted volume threshold (higher in BEAR, lower in BULL)
RSI divergence confirmation in BEAR regimes only
exit_conditions: 2% stop loss in BULL regimes, 1% in BEAR regimes
8614199f7ec0.risk_management: Position size inversely correlated with regime volatility; reduce size by 50% in BEAR markets
8614199f7ec0.rationale: Different market regimes require different risk/reward profiles for mean reversion strategies; bear markets need tighter stops and lower targets due to persistent directional bias.

a9619f64b026.name: Adaptive_Turtle_Soup
a9619f64b026.concept: Dynamic position sizing for turtle soup setups based on market regime strength and momentum persistence
a9619f64b026.market_context: All market regimes, with position sizing adjusted for regime characteristics
entry_conditions: Classic turtle soup false breakout setup identified
Position size = base_size * regime_multiplier (0.3x for BEAR, 0.7x for NEUTRAL, 1.0x for BULL)
exit_conditions: Stop loss at 1.5x ATR below entry in bear markets (vs standard 1x ATR)
Profit target at 0.75x of typical target in bear regimes
Maximum hold time of 3 days in bear markets (vs 5 days in bull markets)
a9619f64b026.risk_management: Maximum 2% portfolio risk per trade, with bear market trades capped at 1% risk
a9619f64b026.rationale: Maintains exposure to profitable turtle soup patterns while acknowledging that bear market dynamics require more conservative sizing and faster exits due to stronger underlying trends

a8332eb9326d.name: Regime_Adaptive_Turtle
a8332eb9326d.concept: Dynamically adjust turtle soup parameters based on market regime and momentum persistence
a8332eb9326d.market_context: All market regimes with emphasis on bear market adaptation
entry_conditions: Regime-adjusted position sizing (50% in BEAR, 100% in BULL, 75% in NEUTRAL)
Momentum filter: skip trade if 20-day momentum < -0.08 in BEAR regime
exit_conditions: Stop loss at 1.5x normal distance in BEAR regime
Profit target reduced by 25% in BEAR regime
Maximum hold time: 3 days in BEAR, 5 days otherwise
a8332eb9326d.rationale: Rather than abandoning turtle soup in bear markets, this adapts the strategy's risk profile and expectations to match regime-specific behavior patterns.

334297a331cc.name: Regime_Uncertainty_Filter
334297a331cc.concept: Reduce position sizing and require multiple confirmations when market regime confidence is low
334297a331cc.market_context: transitional periods between trending and ranging markets
entry_conditions: At least 2 additional technical confirmations required
exit_conditions: Profit target at 1.5R (higher R:R to compensate for lower win rate)
Time-based exit after 5 bars if no momentum
334297a331cc.risk_management: Position size reduced to 50% of normal allocation during uncertain regimes
334297a331cc.rationale: Acknowledges that traditional patterns may be unreliable during regime transitions and compensates with tighter risk management and higher confirmation requirements

ead1f5a514e9.name: Bear_Market_Momentum_Fade
ead1f5a514e9.concept: Fade strong intraday momentum moves in bear markets when they occur against longer-term trend direction
ead1f5a514e9.market_context: Bear market regimes with elevated volatility
exit_conditions: End of trading session if position held > 4 hours
ead1f5a514e9.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% portfolio risk per trade, maximum 3 concurrent positions
ead1f5a514e9.rationale: Bear markets often feature violent counter-trend rallies that exhaust quickly, creating mean reversion opportunities when momentum becomes extreme against the prevailing trend

04a88a032d2a.name: Bear_Momentum_Continuation
04a88a032d2a.concept: Fade turtle soup reversals in bear markets by trading continuation instead
04a88a032d2a.market_context: Bear market regimes with failed breakout patterns
entry_conditions: Price closes below breakout level within 2 bars
04a88a032d2a.risk_management: Position size = 1% account risk per trade, maximum 3 concurrent bear continuation trades
04a88a032d2a.rationale: If turtle soup reversals consistently fail in bear markets, the opposite trade (continuation) should have higher probability as it aligns with the dominant trend and institutional flow.

2614dabcbc3f.name: Bear_Momentum_Confirmation
2614dabcbc3f.concept: Trade with the bear trend when turtle soup setups fail to reverse within expected timeframes
2614dabcbc3f.market_context: Bear regimes with high volatility and poor market breadth
entry_conditions: Initial turtle soup reversal setup triggers
Price fails to reverse within 2 standard deviations of expected move within 3 bars
exit_conditions: Stop: 1.5x original turtle soup reversal target distance
Target: Previous significant support level break
2614dabcbc3f.risk_management: Position size = 50% of normal turtle soup allocation, maximum 3 concurrent positions
2614dabcbc3f.rationale: Rather than avoiding failed turtle soup contexts entirely, this strategy capitalizes on the bear market's tendency to punish reversal attempts by riding the continuation move that caused the reversal failure.

3681a50fe119.name: Volatility_Regime_Turtle_Filter
3681a50fe119.concept: Apply turtle soup patterns only during low-volatility bear market periods with institutional flow confirmation.
3681a50fe119.market_context: Bear markets with below-average realized volatility
exit_conditions: Time: Exit at 15:45 EST if no target hit
3681a50fe119.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% account risk per trade, maximum 3 concurrent positions
3681a50fe119.rationale: Turtle soup patterns may work better when volatility is suppressed and institutional flows provide confirmation, reducing false breakout risk that plagued the original strategy.

350bb725e987.name: Confidence_Decay_Filter
350bb725e987.concept: Dynamically reduce position sizes when bot confidence exceeds historical accuracy in similar market conditions
350bb725e987.market_context: All market regimes, especially during high uncertainty periods
entry_conditions: Historical win rate for similar confidence/regime combinations < bot confidence - 15%
exit_conditions: Original strategy stop loss × 0.7 (tighter due to reduced confidence)
350bb725e987.rationale: Overconfidence is a persistent bias; systematically reducing exposure when confidence exceeds historical performance should improve risk-adjusted returns

f50859e3d74b.name: Bear_Volatility_Filter
f50859e3d74b.concept: Apply dynamic volatility-based position sizing to existing strategies during bear regimes
f50859e3d74b.market_context: Bear market conditions with elevated volatility
entry_conditions: Original strategy signal triggered (e.g., turtle_soup setup)
exit_conditions: Intraday volatility spikes above 90th percentile (immediate exit)
Maximum 2-day holding period in bear markets
f50859e3d74b.risk_management: Reduce position size by 50% when volatility > 70th percentile; implement trailing stops at 1.5x average true range
f50859e3d74b.rationale: Bear markets punish standard strategies during volatility spikes; this approach maintains exposure while dynamically adjusting risk based on real-time market stress indicators.

356c6cd2330f.name: Adaptive_Turtle_Soup
356c6cd2330f.concept: Dynamically adjust turtle soup parameters based on real-time market microstructure signals
356c6cd2330f.market_context: Bear markets with elevated volatility but sufficient liquidity
entry_conditions: VIX term structure in contango (fear subsiding)
exit_conditions: Stop: 0.5x normal turtle soup stop (tighter due to regime)
Time: Exit if no movement within 2 hours (reduced patience)
356c6cd2330f.risk_management: Position size = 0.5x normal allocation, maximum 3 concurrent positions
356c6cd2330f.rationale: Bear markets break traditional patterns, but microstructure-aware turtle soup may capture institutional re-entry points while managing the elevated tail risk that caused the original strategy's failures.

e65a74de27b0.name: Adaptive_Turtle_Soup_Filter
e65a74de27b0.concept: Dynamic turtle soup strategy that adjusts confirmation requirements based on market regime and volatility.
e65a74de27b0.market_context: All market regimes, with adaptive parameters
entry_conditions: Traditional turtle soup setup (false breakout of support/resistance)
Confirmation bars = 1 in BULL markets, 3+ in BEAR markets
Sector correlation < 0.6 during BEAR regimes (to avoid systematic selling)
exit_conditions: Stop loss at 1.5% in BULL, 2.5% in BEAR (wider stops for higher volatility)
Time-based exit after 5 trading days if no movement
e65a74de27b0.risk_management: Position size inversely correlated with VIX (smaller positions during high volatility), maximum 2% risk per trade
e65a74de27b0.rationale: The repeated failures suggest turtle soup needs regime-aware parameters rather than complete avoidance, as the core pattern may still be valid with proper filtering.

ed93489c8d45.name: Bear_Momentum_Fade
ed93489c8d45.concept: Exploit the failure of counter-trend strategies in bear markets by fading their signals
ed93489c8d45.market_context: Bear market regimes with high volatility and negative sentiment

exit_conditions: Stop: 1.5x average daily range against position

ed93489c8d45.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% of portfolio risk per trade, maximum 3 concurrent positions
ed93489c8d45.rationale: If turtle soup consistently fails in bear markets, systematically fading these setups could capture the continuation moves that cause the original strategy to fail

c2e6046da1c0.name: Concern_Flag_Hedge
c2e6046da1c0.concept: Dynamically reduce position size when internal concern flags conflict with primary signal confidence
c2e6046da1c0.market_context: All market regimes, particularly when primary strategy shows high confidence
entry_conditions: Primary strategy generates entry signal with confidence > 60%
One or more concern flags are raised by risk subsystems
exit_conditions: Early exit if concern flags increase during trade
Trailing stop tightened by 20% when concern flags persist
c2e6046da1c0.risk_management: Maximum 0.5R risk per trade when concern flags active, normal sizing when no flags
c2e6046da1c0.rationale: This meta-strategy acknowledges that the bot's concern detection system contains valuable information that shouldn't be overridden by confidence alone, potentially improving risk-adjusted returns.

a48c7e35ba02.name: Bear_Soup_Filter
a48c7e35ba02.concept: Apply turtle soup reversals in bear markets only when multiple confluence factors align
a48c7e35ba02.market_context: bear market regimes with high volatility
entry_conditions: Volume on false breakout < 0.8 * 20-day average volume
exit_conditions: Stop: 1.5x average true range below entry
Target: 0.75x average true range above entry (reduced target in bear markets)
a48c7e35ba02.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% account risk (half normal size in bear markets), maximum 3 concurrent bear soup trades
a48c7e35ba02.rationale: Bear markets require higher conviction signals; low volume false breakouts combined with extreme oversold conditions may indicate genuine reversal opportunities rather than dead cat bounces.

d37dfe721255.name: Regime_Adaptive_Turtle
d37dfe721255.concept: Dynamically adjust turtle soup parameters based on market regime and momentum characteristics
d37dfe721255.market_context: All market regimes with regime-specific calibration
entry_conditions: False breakout identified (classic turtle soup setup)
Position size = base_size * regime_multiplier (0.3 for BEAR, 0.7 for NEUTRAL, 1.0 for BULL)
Momentum filter: only enter if 5d momentum opposes 20d momentum (regime-dependent thresholds)
exit_conditions: Stop loss: 1.5x ATR (2.0x in BEAR markets)
Target: 2x risk in BULL, 1.5x risk in BEAR
d37dfe721255.risk_management: Maximum 2% portfolio risk per trade, reduced to 1% in BEAR regimes
d37dfe721255.rationale: Rather than avoiding turtle soup in bear markets entirely, this strategy acknowledges that the pattern may still be valid but requires different risk parameters and confirmation filters to account for regime-specific market behavior.

c15f98f2f8ce.name: Adaptive_Turtle_Filter
c15f98f2f8ce.concept: Deploy turtle soup setups only when market microstructure suggests genuine exhaustion rather than trend continuation.
c15f98f2f8ce.market_context: Bear markets with mixed momentum signals
entry_conditions: Traditional turtle soup setup present (failed breakout)
VIX > 20th percentile of 60-day range (some fear present)
No more than 1 turtle soup loss in past 5 trading days
Sector rotation breadth indicator shows defensive outperformance
exit_conditions: 2% profit target or return to breakout level
Exit if new turtle soup setup triggers within 3 days (regime confirmation)
c15f98f2f8ce.risk_management: Position size inversely correlated with recent turtle soup failure rate; max 1% portfolio risk per trade
c15f98f2f8ce.rationale: This strategy acknowledges that turtle soup patterns require specific market conditions to succeed and builds in regime awareness rather than mechanical application.

719312823a35.name: Bear_Market_Turtle_Adaptive
719312823a35.concept: Dynamically adjust turtle soup parameters based on bear market sub-regime characteristics
719312823a35.market_context: Bear markets with high volatility and frequent false breakouts
entry_conditions: Classic turtle soup setup (false breakout reversal)
Volume confirmation on reversal candle > 1.2x average
RSI divergence between price breakout and momentum
exit_conditions: Stop loss at 1.5x normal turtle soup stop (accounting for higher volatility)
Profit target at 0.75x normal target (taking profits earlier in uncertain environment)
Time-based exit after 3 days if no momentum
719312823a35.risk_management: Reduce position size by 40% compared to bull market turtle soup trades
719312823a35.rationale: Bear markets create more genuine turtle soup opportunities but require tighter risk management and modified profit expectations due to increased uncertainty and volatility.

7ba8a61d58a5.name: Regime_Pattern_Filter
7ba8a61d58a5.concept: Dynamically filter trading patterns based on real-time regime compatibility scoring
7ba8a61d58a5.market_context: All market conditions, but especially during regime uncertainty
entry_conditions: Base pattern signal triggers (e.g., turtle_soup setup)
Confidence adjusted down by regime uncertainty factor
exit_conditions: Stop loss at -0.5R (tighter due to regime risk)
Exit if regime compatibility drops below 0.3
7ba8a61d58a5.risk_management: Position size reduced by (1 - regime_certainty_score), maximum 0.5% account risk per trade
7ba8a61d58a5.rationale: Most pattern failures occur due to regime mismatches; explicitly modeling this relationship should improve edge consistency and reduce overconfidence in unstable conditions.

060461edb5ed.name: Bear_Soup_Volume_Filter
060461edb5ed.concept: Apply turtle soup reversals in bear markets only when accompanied by exceptional volume and sentiment divergence
060461edb5ed.market_context: Bear market regimes with high volatility
entry_conditions: Price breaks key support/resistance level on low volume (< 0.8x average)
Reversal occurs within 2 hours with volume spike (> 2x average)
VIX showing negative divergence (declining while price falls)
exit_conditions: Target: 50% retracement of initial false move
Time exit: Close position after 5 trading days
060461edb5ed.risk_management: Position size = 0.5x normal allocation due to bear market uncertainty
060461edb5ed.rationale: Bear markets create more violent false breakouts followed by sharp reversals, but only when institutional volume confirms the setup

c32e56f91575.name: Bear_Turtle_Fade
c32e56f91575.concept: Systematically fade turtle soup signals during confirmed bear regimes when volatility exceeds trend strength
c32e56f91575.market_context: Bear markets with high volatility relative to trend momentum

Stop loss at 1.2x entry risk (tight given expected quick moves)
Time exit at 2 hours if no movement
c32e56f91575.risk_management: Position size = 0.25x normal turtle soup allocation, maximum 2% portfolio risk per trade
c32e56f91575.rationale: If turtle soup consistently fails in bear/high-vol environments, systematically betting against these setups when they're most likely to fail could capture the inverse edge while limiting downside through reduced position sizing.

430bdd2e273e.name: Bear_Regime_Fade
430bdd2e273e.concept: Fade turtle soup reversals in bear markets by shorting the bounce instead of buying the dip
430bdd2e273e.market_context: Bear market regimes with high correlation to broader market weakness
entry_conditions: Market regime = BEAR (20-day MA below 50-day MA)
Turtle soup pattern identified (false breakdown followed by bounce)
Volume on bounce < 80% of breakdown volume
Price bounces to 38.2%-61.8% Fibonacci retracement of breakdown move
exit_conditions: Target: New lows below original breakdown level
Time: Close position after 5 trading days if no target hit
430bdd2e273e.risk_management: Position size 0.5% of portfolio risk per trade, maximum 3 concurrent positions
430bdd2e273e.rationale: In bear markets, turtle soup patterns often represent institutional distribution where the "reversal" is actually a dead cat bounce that smart money uses to exit positions at better prices.

b4772cab9b00.name: Regime_Aware_Turtle_Filter
b4772cab9b00.concept: Apply turtle soup reversals only when market microstructure indicates genuine breakout potential rather than bear market noise.
b4772cab9b00.market_context: Bear markets with mixed volatility signals
entry_conditions: Traditional turtle soup setup (false breakout above resistance)
Sector rotation momentum diverging from index (indicating selective strength)
exit_conditions: Stop loss at 1.5x ATR instead of fixed percentage
Profit target at previous swing low
Exit if VIX term structure flips to backwardation
b4772cab9b00.risk_management: Reduce position size by 50% in bear regimes, implement correlation-based portfolio heat limits
b4772cab9b00.rationale: Bear market breakouts succeed when driven by fundamental rotation rather than technical momentum, requiring regime-specific filters to separate signal from noise.

6f5b45c0082c.name: Confidence_Volatility_Filter
6f5b45c0082c.concept: Inverse position sizing based on confidence levels during high volatility periods
6f5b45c0082c.market_context: High volatility regimes where confidence calibration breaks down
exit_conditions: Maximum 2-day hold period in choppy regimes
6f5b45c0082c.risk_management: Position size = base_size * (100 - confidence_level) / 100, maximum 0.5R risk
6f5b45c0082c.rationale: Exploits the bot's apparent overconfidence bias in volatile conditions by inversely scaling position size, potentially improving risk-adjusted returns when the bot is most likely to be wrong.

db3a01edbcde.name: Regime_Aware_Turtle_Soup
db3a01edbcde.concept: Apply turtle soup pattern recognition only when market regime supports reversal dynamics
db3a01edbcde.market_context: Bull markets or high-confidence reversal zones in bear markets
entry_conditions: Traditional turtle soup setup (false breakdown below support)
regime = BULL OR (regime = BEAR AND rsi < 25 AND near major support)
db3a01edbcde.rationale: By filtering turtle soup trades through regime analysis and recent pattern success rates, the strategy should avoid the systematic failures observed in bear markets while maintaining edge in favorable conditions.

87bab9981800.name: Adaptive_Turtle_Filter
87bab9981800.concept: Apply dynamic volatility and liquidity filters to turtle soup setups rather than blanket bear market avoidance
87bab9981800.market_context: All market regimes with enhanced filtering during stressed conditions
entry_conditions: Traditional turtle soup setup (false breakout reversal)
No significant economic events within 2 hours
exit_conditions: Stop: 1.2x average true range from entry
Target: 0.8x average true range in favorable direction
87bab9981800.risk_management: Position size inversely proportional to current volatility percentile; maximum 1% account risk per trade
87bab9981800.rationale: Rather than avoiding bear markets entirely, this strategy maintains turtle soup edge while filtering out the specific conditions that historically degraded performance

51fcd0de5a2f.name: Regime_Adaptive_Breakout
51fcd0de5a2f.concept: Dynamically adjust breakout confirmation requirements based on market regime strength.
51fcd0de5a2f.market_context: All market regimes, with adaptive parameters
entry_conditions: Regime strength filter: BULL (1x confirmation), NEUTRAL (1.5x), BEAR (2x volume confirmation)
Volatility-adjusted position sizing based on VIX percentile
exit_conditions: Stop loss: 1.5x ATR in BULL, 1.0x ATR in BEAR
Profit target: 2x risk in BULL, 1.5x risk in BEAR
51fcd0de5a2f.risk_management: Position size = base_size * (1 - regime_stress_factor) where regime_stress_factor ranges 0-0.5
51fcd0de5a2f.rationale: Rather than avoiding breakouts in bear markets, this strategy acknowledges that different regimes require different confirmation thresholds and risk parameters.

0fc40f4af68d.name: Bear_Soup_Fade
0fc40f4af68d.concept: Systematically fade turtle soup breakout attempts during confirmed bear markets
0fc40f4af68d.market_context: Bear market regimes with elevated volatility
entry_conditions: turtle soup pattern identified (false breakout above resistance)
entry within 2 hours of breakout failure
exit_conditions: Target: Previous swing low or 3% profit, whichever comes first
Time: Close position at end of trading day if no clear direction
0fc40f4af68d.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% account risk per trade, maximum 3 concurrent positions
0fc40f4af68d.rationale: Bear markets punish failed breakouts more severely as buying interest is limited and sellers are more aggressive, creating asymmetric risk/reward for fading these patterns

3620745137c6.name: Confidence_Divergence_Filter
3620745137c6.concept: Trade only when confidence levels align with historical performance in similar market contexts
3620745137c6.market_context: All market regimes, particularly choppy conditions
entry_conditions: Current confidence level within ±10% of historical win rate for similar setups
Risk signal count < 2 OR slow-path decision validation required
exit_conditions: Exit if confidence drops below 40% during trade
3620745137c6.risk_management: Position size inversely correlated with confidence-performance divergence; max 0.5% risk per trade when divergence > 20%
3620745137c6.rationale: By filtering trades based on confidence calibration, the bot can avoid systematic overconfidence traps while maintaining edge in well-understood setups

7db13fef1b14.name: Bear_Momentum_Continuation
7db13fef1b14.concept: Trade with the primary bear trend when turtle soup reversal signals fail
7db13fef1b14.market_context: bear market regimes with high volatility
entry_conditions: price breaks below turtle soup entry within 2 bars
exit_conditions: profit target at 2x initial stop distance
stop loss at turtle soup reversal high
7db13fef1b14.risk_management: position size = 0.5x normal due to bear market volatility
7db13fef1b14.rationale: Failed reversals in bear markets often signal strong continuation moves as weak hands capitulate

01bbe03c99dc.name: Adaptive_Turtle_Soup
01bbe03c99dc.concept: Dynamic position sizing and confirmation filters for turtle soup patterns based on market regime and volatility.
01bbe03c99dc.market_context: Bear market conditions with elevated volatility
exit_conditions: Stop loss at 1.5x ATR from entry
Time-based exit after 5 bars if no movement
01bbe03c99dc.risk_management: Position size = base_size * (25/VIX) with maximum 50% reduction during bear regimes
01bbe03c99dc.rationale: Combines the bot's existing turtle soup expertise with regime-aware risk management and volume confirmation to address the identified failure pattern systematically.

f06a474abf67.name: Bear_Soup_Fade
f06a474abf67.concept: Fade turtle soup breakouts during bear markets when accompanied by volume divergence
f06a474abf67.market_context: Bear market regimes with failed momentum patterns
exit_conditions: Target: Return to pre-breakout support level
Time: Close position after 3 trading days maximum
f06a474abf67.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% of portfolio risk per trade, maximum 3 concurrent positions
f06a474abf67.rationale: Bear markets create conditions where apparent breakouts fail due to lack of follow-through buying, creating profitable fade opportunities when volume confirms weakness

a14c20c56e92.name: Bear_Trap_Fade
a14c20c56e92.concept: Fade failed breakouts in bear markets by entering opposite to the original breakout direction after confirmation of failure.
a14c20c56e92.market_context: Bear market regimes with high volatility
entry_conditions: Price reverses back through breakout level within 2-4 bars
Enter in direction of reversal with momentum confirmation
exit_conditions: Target: Previous swing high/low or 2:1 risk/reward
Time exit: Close position at end of session if no momentum
a14c20c56e92.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% account risk, maximum 3 concurrent positions
a14c20c56e92.rationale: Bear markets create more false breakouts as institutions trap retail traders; fading these failed moves captures the subsequent momentum in the true trend direction.

55282c56855f.name: Confidence_Penalty_Filter
55282c56855f.concept: Reduce position size when confidence exceeds historical accuracy by significant margins
55282c56855f.market_context: All market regimes, especially during choppy or transitional periods
entry_conditions: Confidence level is calibrated against historical performance in current regime
exit_conditions: Maximum 3-day holding period for high-confidence trades that aren't working
55282c56855f.risk_management: Position size = base_size × min(1.0, historical_win_rate_in_regime / stated_confidence)
55282c56855f.rationale: Overconfidence is a persistent bias; systematically penalizing it could improve risk-adjusted returns while forcing better calibration

ea9aa46ad2bd.name: Bear_Momentum_Continuation
ea9aa46ad2bd.concept: Trade with the bear trend when turtle soup setups fail, converting failed reversals into momentum entries.
ea9aa46ad2bd.market_context: Bear market regimes with high volatility
entry_conditions: Initial turtle soup setup triggers but fails within 2 bars
Volume on breakout exceeds 20-day average by 50%
Price closes below turtle soup entry level
exit_conditions: Stop: Price recovers above turtle soup high
Target: 2x the initial turtle soup risk
Time: Close position after 5 trading days
ea9aa46ad2bd.risk_management: Position size 50% of normal turtle soup allocation, maximum 2% portfolio risk per trade
ea9aa46ad2bd.rationale: Failed reversals in bear markets often signal continuation moves; this strategy capitalizes on the bot's systematic turtle soup failures by flipping the logic.

b6b981d2e3af.name: Regime_Adaptive_Turtle_Filter
b6b981d2e3af.concept: Apply volatility and sentiment filters to turtle soup setups based on market regime characteristics.
b6b981d2e3af.market_context: Bear markets with elevated volatility and negative sentiment divergences
entry_conditions: RSI(14) oversold but showing positive divergence
exit_conditions: Stop loss at 1.5x average true range
b6b981d2e3af.risk_management: Reduce position size by 50% in bear regimes; maximum 3 concurrent positions
b6b981d2e3af.rationale: Turtle soup patterns fail in bear markets when volatility and sentiment reach extremes, so filtering these conditions should improve the strategy's reliability while maintaining exposure to genuine reversal opportunities.

3583efe64fa6.name: Bear_Regime_Turtle_Filter
3583efe64fa6.concept: Apply regime-specific filters to turtle soup patterns, requiring additional confirmation in bear markets
3583efe64fa6.market_context: Bear market regimes with high volatility and downtrend momentum
entry_conditions: Regime = BEAR confirmed by 20-day moving average slope
Wait for 2-3 confirmation bars above breakdown level
exit_conditions: Stop loss: 1.5x normal turtle soup stop distance
Time-based exit: 5 trading days maximum hold
3583efe64fa6.risk_management: Reduce position size by 50% compared to bull market turtle soup trades
3583efe64fa6.rationale: Bear markets create more false reversals; additional confirmation and conservative targets may capture genuine reversals while avoiding the majority of failed setups

6e7474c3e9ef.name: Volatility_Regime_Filter
6e7474c3e9ef.concept: Apply dynamic position sizing to existing strategies based on volatility regime stability rather than binary on/off switching.
6e7474c3e9ef.market_context: All market regimes, particularly during regime uncertainty periods
entry_conditions: Original strategy signal triggers (e.g., turtle_soup setup)
Calculate 10-day rolling volatility regime stability score (0-1)
exit_conditions: Force exit if volatility regime stability drops below 0.3 mid-trade
Scale out 50% of position if stability score decreases by >0.4 from entry
6e7474c3e9ef.risk_management: Maximum position size capped at 50% of normal during regime uncertainty (stability < 0.5)
6e7474c3e9ef.rationale: Rather than avoiding strategies entirely during challenging periods, this approach maintains market exposure while dynamically adjusting risk based on regime confidence, potentially capturing opportunities the bot currently abandons.

90673af3ff8c.name: Confidence_Decay_Filter
90673af3ff8c.concept: Dynamically reduce position sizing when confidence exceeds historical accuracy in similar market conditions
90673af3ff8c.market_context: All regimes, particularly choppy and low volatility environments
entry_conditions: Confidence level adjusted by regime-specific calibration factor
Position size inversely correlated to confidence-accuracy gap
exit_conditions: Maximum 3-day hold period in choppy regimes
90673af3ff8c.rationale: Overconfidence appears to be a systematic bias; penalizing high confidence with smaller positions could improve risk-adjusted returns while maintaining signal capture.

11ce7689ec77.name: Volatility_Regime_Adaptive_Contrarian
11ce7689ec77.concept: Scale turtle soup position sizes inversely to volatility regime transition probability
11ce7689ec77.market_context: Bear markets with elevated but declining volatility
entry_conditions: VIX declining from 30+ day high but still >75th percentile
exit_conditions: Stop: 1.5x normal turtle soup stop distance during bear regimes
Target: Scale out 50% at 0.8x normal target, remainder at 1.2x target
Time: Force exit if position held >3 days in bear regime
11ce7689ec77.risk_management: Position size = base_size * (1 - vix_transition_probability), max 0.5x normal size
11ce7689ec77.rationale: Acknowledges that contrarian strategies need reduced conviction during regime uncertainty while maintaining exposure to mean reversion opportunities

4faa39294ff4.name: Bear_Momentum_Fade
4faa39294ff4.concept: Counter-trend entries in bear markets only after extreme momentum exhaustion signals
4faa39294ff4.market_context: Bear regime with oversold conditions and momentum divergence
entry_conditions: regime = BEAR AND rsi_14 < 25 AND momentum_5d < -0.05
Volume spike > 1.5x average AND price below 20-day low
4faa39294ff4.risk_management: Position size = 25% of normal allocation, maximum 2 concurrent positions
4faa39294ff4.rationale: Bear markets create extreme oversold bounces, but only after genuine capitulation events with volume confirmation and volatility term structure signals.

d5b51eda4a28.name: Bear_Fade_Confirmation
d5b51eda4a28.concept: Fade turtle soup breakouts in bear markets only when volume and momentum diverge
d5b51eda4a28.market_context: bear market regimes with elevated volatility
entry_conditions: volume on breakout < 0.8x average daily volume
RSI divergence present on breakout candle
exit_conditions: exit at market close if no movement within 2 hours
d5b51eda4a28.risk_management: position size = 0.5% portfolio risk per trade, maximum 3 concurrent positions
d5b51eda4a28.rationale: Low volume turtle soup patterns in bear markets may represent weak institutional conviction, making fades more profitable than traditional turtle soup reversals

3fa738b1dbb4.name: Volatility_Regime_Turtle_Filter
3fa738b1dbb4.concept: Apply turtle soup strategy only when volatility regime favors breakout sustainability
3fa738b1dbb4.market_context: Bear markets with stabilizing volatility patterns
entry_conditions: Traditional turtle soup setup (false breakout reversal)
3fa738b1dbb4.risk_management: 0.25% portfolio risk per trade, maximum 3 concurrent turtle soup positions
3fa738b1dbb4.rationale: Declining volatility in bear markets may indicate consolidation phases where false breakouts are more likely to sustain their reversals

8bdafe996d2b.name: Concern_Weight_Filter
8bdafe996d2b.concept: Dynamically adjust position sizing based on the number and severity of pre-trade concerns flagged by risk modules.
8bdafe996d2b.market_context: All market regimes, particularly when multiple warning signals are present
entry_conditions: Concern severity score calculated from flagged risks
Position size inversely correlated to concern score
exit_conditions: Immediate exit if new high-severity concerns emerge post-entry
Reduce position by 50% if moderate concerns develop
8bdafe996d2b.risk_management: Position size = base_size * (1 - concern_severity_score), maximum 0.5R risk when concerns > threshold
8bdafe996d2b.rationale: This meta-strategy addresses the bot's tendency to ignore its own warning systems by making risk management proportional to internal uncertainty.

a7040ba2bc9d.name: Adaptive_Turtle_Soup
a7040ba2bc9d.concept: Dynamic turtle soup implementation that adjusts parameters based on market regime and volatility environment
a7040ba2bc9d.market_context: All market regimes with regime-specific parameter adjustments
entry_conditions: False breakout identified (price moves beyond support/resistance then reverses)
Volume confirmation: current volume > 1.3x recent average in bear markets, > 1.1x in bull markets
VIX-adjusted position sizing (smaller positions when VIX > 25)
exit_conditions: Stop loss: 1.5x ATR in bull markets, 1.0x ATR in bear markets
Profit target: 2x risk in bull markets, 1.5x risk in bear markets
Time stop: 5 days maximum hold in bear markets, 10 days in bull markets
a7040ba2bc9d.risk_management: Position size = base_size * (1 - VIX/100) with maximum 2% account risk per trade
a7040ba2bc9d.rationale: Bear markets require tighter risk controls and faster exits due to persistent downward pressure, while bull markets allow for more patient profit-taking

04ef58043f8f.name: Regime_Transition_Momentum
04ef58043f8f.concept: Capture momentum during the early phases of regime transitions when pattern reliability shifts
04ef58043f8f.market_context: regime transitions (BEAR to BULL or BULL to BEAR within 5-15 trading days)
entry_conditions: Regime confidence score between 0.3-0.7 (indicating transition uncertainty)
Price breaks above/below 10-day moving average with momentum confirmation
04ef58043f8f.risk_management: Position size = 0.5x normal allocation during regime uncertainty, maximum 3 concurrent positions
04ef58043f8f.rationale: Traditional patterns like turtle soup may fail during regime transitions, but pure momentum often persists as markets search for new equilibrium levels

b994239d33ed.name: Momentum_Confirmation_Filter
b994239d33ed.concept: Layer momentum confirmation on top of mean reversion signals during bear markets
b994239d33ed.market_context: Bear market regimes with sustained selling pressure
entry_conditions: BUT require RSI < 30 AND price > 20-day EMA (momentum contradiction filter)
Volume spike > 1.5x average confirms genuine reversal interest
exit_conditions: Target: Return to recent swing high
Time exit: 5 trading days maximum hold
b994239d33ed.risk_management: Half normal position size in BEAR regime, maximum 2% portfolio risk per trade
b994239d33ed.rationale: Combines the bot's existing turtle soup logic with momentum filters to avoid catching falling knives during sustained bear phases.

a6119f6fc5d8.name: Volatility_Adjusted_Turtle_Soup
a6119f6fc5d8.concept: Dynamically adjust turtle soup position sizing and entry thresholds based on realized volatility and market regime.
a6119f6fc5d8.market_context: Bear markets with elevated volatility where traditional turtle soup shows high failure rates
entry_conditions: VIX percentile < 70 OR position size reduced by 50% if VIX percentile > 70
Require additional confirmation signal (e.g., volume spike, sentiment extreme)
exit_conditions: Stop loss at 1.5x normal distance during high VIX periods
Take profit at 0.75x normal target to account for increased reversal risk
Maximum hold time of 3 days in bear/high-vol environment
a6119f6fc5d8.risk_management: Position size inversely correlated to VIX level; maximum 0.5% account risk per trade when VIX > 30
a6119f6fc5d8.rationale: Maintains exposure to profitable turtle soup opportunities while adapting to the higher failure rate and volatility in bear markets through dynamic risk adjustment.

fdd6acb24d44.name: Regime_Aware_Confidence_Damping
fdd6acb24d44.concept: Dynamically reduce position size and confidence when regime complexity exceeds strategy's historical performance threshold
fdd6acb24d44.market_context: Any regime where strategy historical performance degrades significantly
entry_conditions: Regime complexity score calculated from volatility, correlation, and trend consistency
Historical strategy performance in similar regimes assessed
exit_conditions: Additional early exit if regime complexity increases by >30% post-entry
Confidence-based position scaling allows smaller losses
fdd6acb24d44.rationale: Rather than avoiding trades entirely, this meta-strategy acknowledges that some patterns work but with reduced reliability in certain conditions, allowing the bot to participate while managing the elevated risk through dynamic sizing.

78f90cecb921.name: Bear_Momentum_Exhaustion
78f90cecb921.concept: Identify when bear market selling pressure shows signs of exhaustion through volume and volatility divergences
78f90cecb921.market_context: Bear regimes with elevated VIX and declining volume on down days
entry_conditions: RSI < 30 with bullish divergence on intraday timeframe
exit_conditions: Target: Previous swing high or 5% gain
78f90cecb921.risk_management: Position size = 0.5% account risk, maximum 3 concurrent positions
78f90cecb921.rationale: Bear markets create oversold bounces when selling exhaustion coincides with technical oversold conditions; volume decline suggests fewer sellers remaining

8ac4a935ce0b.name: Momentum_Persistence_Filter
8ac4a935ce0b.concept: Layer momentum strength filters on top of existing reversal strategies to avoid counter-trend trades during strong directional moves.
8ac4a935ce0b.market_context: Bear markets with sustained momentum (ADX > 25, declining 20-day MA)
exit_conditions: Target: 0.75x normal turtle_soup target (take profits earlier)
Time: Exit after 3 days if no movement toward target
8ac4a935ce0b.risk_management: Reduce position size by 40% compared to normal turtle_soup trades; maximum 2% portfolio risk per trade
8ac4a935ce0b.rationale: Bear markets often exhibit momentum persistence that invalidates quick mean reversion assumptions; filtering for lower momentum environments while maintaining smaller positions should preserve edge while reducing drawdowns.

c63d49c4651f.name: Regime_Adaptive_Turtle
c63d49c4651f.concept: Dynamically adjust turtle soup entry criteria based on bear market momentum characteristics
c63d49c4651f.market_context: Bear markets with varying momentum profiles
entry_conditions: Traditional turtle soup setup (false breakout below support)
No new 20-day lows in past 3 sessions (momentum cooling)
exit_conditions: Stop: 1.5% below entry (tighter than bull market)
Target: 2% above entry (reduced target in bear regime)
Time: Close position if no movement within 5 sessions
c63d49c4651f.risk_management: Half normal position size in bear markets, maximum 2% portfolio risk per trade
c63d49c4651f.rationale: Bear markets require more selective turtle soup application, focusing on momentum exhaustion rather than simple technical levels, with asymmetric risk management reflecting the challenging regime.
